translations.translation: As for the disbelievers, they will have the Fire of Hell, where they will not be [allowed to be] finished by death, nor will its torment be lightened for them. This is how We reward every [stubborn] disbeliever.

verses.text: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا۟ فَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ

translations.translation: There they will be [fervently] screaming, “Our Lord! Take us out [and send us back]. We will do good, unlike what we used to do.” [They will be told,] “Did We not give you lives long enough so that whoever wanted to be mindful could have done so? And the warner came to you. So taste [the punishment], for the wrongdoers have no helper.”

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَـٰلِمُ غَيْبِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

translations.translation: Indeed, Allah is the Knower of the unseen of the heavens and the earth. He surely knows best what is [hidden] in the heart.

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُۥ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

translations.translation: He is the One Who has placed you as successors on earth. So whoever disbelieves will bear [the burden of] their own disbelief. The disbelievers’ denial only increases them in contempt in the sight of their Lord, and it will only contribute to their loss.

verses.text: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ أَمْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ كِتَـٰبًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا

translations.translation: Ask [them, O  Prophet], “Have you considered your associate-gods which you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created on earth! Or do they have a share in [the creation of] the heavens? Or have We given the polytheists a Book, which serves as a clear proof for them? In fact, the wrongdoers promise each other nothing but delusion.”

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَآ إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا

translations.translation: Indeed, Allah [alone] keeps the heavens and the earth from falling apart. If they were to fall apart, none but Him could hold them up. He is truly Most Forbearing, All-Forgiving.

verses.text: وَأَقْسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ لَئِن جَآءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى ٱلْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا

translations.translation: They swore by Allah their most solemn oaths that if a warner were to come to them, they would certainly be better guided than any other community. Yet when a warner did come to them, it only drove them farther away—

verses.text: ٱسْتِكْبَارًا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ ٱلسَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ ٱلْمَكْرُ ٱلسَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِۦ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا

translations.translation: behaving arrogantly in the land and plotting evil. But evil plotting only backfires on those who plot. Are they awaiting anything but the fate of those [destroyed] before? You will find no change in the way of Allah, nor will you find it diverted [to someone else].

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُۥ مِن شَىْءٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا

translations.translation: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those [destroyed] before them? They were far superior in might. But there is nothing that can escape Allah in the heavens or the earth. He is certainly All-Knowing, Most Capable.

verses.text: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَآبَّةٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ بَصِيرًۢا

translations.translation: If Allah were to punish people [immediately] for what they have committed, He would not have left a single living being on earth. But He delays them for an appointed term. And when their time arrives, then surely Allah is All-Seeing of His servants.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ يسٓ

translations.translation: Yâ-Sĩn.

verses.text: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

translations.translation: By the Quran, rich in wisdom!

verses.text: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: You [O Prophet] are truly one of the messengers

verses.text: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

translations.translation: upon the Straight Path.

verses.text: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

translations.translation: [This is] a revelation from the Almighty, Most Merciful,

verses.text: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ

translations.translation: so that you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, and so are heedless.

verses.text: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.translation: The decree [of torment] has already been justified against most of them, for they will never believe.

verses.text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ

translations.translation: [It is as if] We have put shackles around their necks up to their chins, so their heads are forced up,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: and have placed a barrier before them and a barrier behind them and covered them [all] up, so they fail to see [the truth].

verses.text: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.translation: It is the same whether you warn them or not—they will never believe.

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ

translations.translation: You can only warn those who follow the Reminder and are in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing Him. So give them good news of forgiveness and an honourable reward.

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: It is certainly We Who resurrect the dead, and write what they send forth and what they leave behind. Everything is listed by Us in a perfect Record.

verses.text: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.translation: Give them an example [O Prophet] of the residents of a town, when the messengers came to them.

verses.text: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ

translations.translation: We sent them two messengers, but they rejected both. So We reinforced [the two] with a third, and they declared, “We have indeed been sent to you [as messengers].”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ

translations.translation: The people replied, “You are only humans like us, and the Most Compassionate has not revealed anything. You are simply lying!”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.translation: The messengers responded, “Our Lord knows that we have truly been sent to you.

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translations.translation: And our duty is only to deliver [the message] clearly.”

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

translations.translation: The people replied, “We definitely see you as a bad omen for us. If you do not desist, we will certainly stone you [to death] and you will be touched with a painful punishment from us.”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ

translations.translation: The messengers said, “Your bad omen lies within yourselves. Are you saying this because you are reminded [of the truth]? In fact, you are a transgressing people.”

verses.text: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: Then from the farthest end of the city a man came, rushing. He advised, “O my people! Follow the messengers.

verses.text: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ

translations.translation: Follow those who ask no reward of you, and are [rightly] guided.

verses.text: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.translation: And why should I not worship the One Who has originated me, and to Whom you will be returned.

verses.text: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ

translations.translation: How could I take besides Him other gods whose intercession would not be of any benefit to me, nor could they save me if the Most Compassionate intended to harm me?

verses.text: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, I would then be clearly astray.

verses.text: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ

translations.translation: I do believe in your Lord, so listen to me.”

verses.text: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: [But they killed him, then] he was told [by the angels], “Enter Paradise!” He said, “If only my people knew

verses.text: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ

translations.translation: of how my Lord has forgiven me, and made me one of the honourable.”

verses.text: وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

translations.translation: We did not send any soldiers from the heavens against his people after his death, nor did We need to.

verses.text: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ

translations.translation: All it took was one [mighty] blast, and they were extinguished at once.

verses.text: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translations.translation: Oh pity, such beings! No messenger ever came to them without being mocked.

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.translation: Have the deniers not considered how many peoples We destroyed before them who never came back to life again?

verses.text: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

translations.translation: Yet they will all be brought before Us.

verses.text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ

translations.translation: There is a sign for them in the dead earth: We give it life, producing grain from it for them to eat.

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ

translations.translation: And We have placed in it gardens of palm trees and grapevines, and caused springs to gush forth in it,

verses.text: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

translations.translation: so that they may eat from its fruit, which they had no hand in making. Will they not then give thanks?

verses.text: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: Glory be to the One Who created all [things in] pairs—[be it] what the earth produces, their genders, or what they do not know!

verses.text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ

translations.translation: There is also a sign for them in the night: We strip from it daylight, then—behold!—they are in darkness.

verses.text: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ

translations.translation: The sun travels for its fixed term. That is the design of the Almighty, All-Knowing.

verses.text: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ

translations.translation: As for the moon, We have ordained [precise] phases for it, until it ends up [looking] like an old, curved palm stalk.

verses.text: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ

translations.translation: It is not for the sun to catch up with the moon, nor does the night outrun the day. Each is travelling in an orbit of their own.

verses.text: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

translations.translation: Another sign for them is that We carried their ancestors [with Noah] in the fully loaded Ark,

verses.text: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ

translations.translation: and created for them similar things to ride in.

verses.text: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ

translations.translation: If We willed, We could drown them: then no one would respond to their cries, nor would they be rescued—

verses.text: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

translations.translation: except by mercy from Us, allowing them enjoyment for a [little] while.

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

translations.translation: [Still they turn away] when it is said to them, “Beware of what is ahead of you [in the Hereafter] and what is behind you [of destroyed nations] so you may be shown mercy.”

verses.text: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ

translations.translation: Whenever a sign comes to them from their Lord, they turn away from it.

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: And when it is said to them, “Donate from what Allah has provided for you,” the disbelievers say to the believers, “Why should we feed those whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to? You are clearly astray!”

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.translation: And they ask [the believers], “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

verses.text: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ

translations.translation: They must be awaiting a single Blast, which will seize them while they are [entrenched] in [worldly] disputes.

verses.text: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.translation: Then they will not be able to make a [last] will, nor can they return to their own people.

verses.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ

translations.translation: The Trumpet will be blown [a second time], then—behold!—they will rush from the graves to their Lord.

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.translation: They will cry, “Woe to us! Who has raised us up from our place of rest? This must be what the Most Compassionate warned us of; the messengers told the truth!”

verses.text: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

translations.translation: It will only take one Blast, then at once they will all be brought before Us.

verses.text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: On that Day no soul will be wronged in the least, nor will you be rewarded except for what you used to do.

verses.text: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ

translations.translation: Indeed, on that Day the residents of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves.

verses.text: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

translations.translation: They and their spouses will be in [cool] shade, reclining on [canopied] couches.

verses.text: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

translations.translation: There they will have fruits and whatever they desire.

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ

translations.translation: And “Peace!” will be [their] greeting from the Merciful Lord.

verses.text: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

translations.translation: [Then the disbelievers will be told,] “Step away [from the believers] this Day, O  wicked ones!

verses.text: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: Did I not command you, O  Children of Adam, not to follow Satan, for he is truly your sworn enemy,

verses.text: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

translations.translation: but to worship Me [alone]? This is the Straight Path.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.translation: Yet he already misled great multitudes of you. Did you not have any sense?

verses.text: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ

translations.translation: This is the Hell you were warned of.

verses.text: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ

translations.translation: Burn in it Today for your disbelief.”

verses.text: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

translations.translation: On this Day We will seal their mouths, their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to commit.

verses.text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: Had We willed, We could have easily blinded their eyes, so they would struggle to find their way. How then could they see?

verses.text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.translation: And had We willed, We could have transfigured them on the spot, so they could neither progress forward nor turn back.

verses.text: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ

translations.translation: And whoever We grant a long life, We reverse them in development. Will they not then understand?

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: We have not taught him poetry, nor is it fitting for him. This [Book] is only a Reminder and a clear Quran

verses.text: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.translation: to warn whoever is [truly] alive and fulfil the decree [of torment] against the disbelievers.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ

translations.translation: Do they not see that We singlehandedly created for them, among other things, cattle which are under their control?

verses.text: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ

translations.translation: And We have subjected these [animals] to them, so they may ride some and eat others.

verses.text: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

translations.translation: And they derive from them other benefits and drinks. Will they not then give thanks?

verses.text: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

translations.translation: Still they have taken other gods besides Allah, hoping to be helped [by them].

verses.text: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ

translations.translation: They cannot help the pagans, even though they serve the idols as dedicated guards.

verses.text: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

translations.translation: So do not let their words grieve you [O Prophet]. Indeed, We [fully] know what they conceal and what they reveal.

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: Do people not see that We have created them from a sperm-drop, then—behold!—they openly challenge [Us]?

verses.text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ

translations.translation: And they argue with Us—forgetting they were created—saying, “Who will give life to decayed bones?”

verses.text: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “They will be revived by the One Who produced them the first time, for He has [perfect] knowledge of every created being.

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ

translations.translation: [He is the One] Who gives you fire from green trees, and—behold!—you kindle [fire] from them.

verses.text: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.translation: Can the One Who created the heavens and the earth not [easily] resurrect these [deniers]?” Yes [He can]! For He is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.

verses.text: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

translations.translation: All it takes, when He wills something [to be], is simply to say to it: “Be!” And it is!

verses.text: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.translation: So glory be to the One in Whose Hands is the authority over all things, and to Whom [alone] you will [all] be returned.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلصَّـٰٓفَّـٰتِ صَفًّا

translations.translation: By those [angels] lined up in ranks,

verses.text: فَٱلزَّٰجِرَٰتِ زَجْرًا

translations.translation: and those who diligently drive [the clouds],

verses.text: فَٱلتَّـٰلِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا

translations.translation: and those who recite the Reminder!

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَٰحِدٌ

translations.translation: Surely your God is One!

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ

translations.translation: [He is] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, and the Lord of all points of sunrise.

verses.text: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ

translations.translation: Indeed, We have adorned the lowest heaven with the stars for decoration

verses.text: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ مَّارِدٍ

translations.translation: and [for] protection from every rebellious devil.

verses.text: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ

translations.translation: They cannot listen to the highest assembly [of angels] for they are pelted from every side,

verses.text: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ

translations.translation: [fiercely] driven away. And they will suffer an everlasting torment.

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ

translations.translation: But whoever manages to stealthily eavesdrop is [instantly] pursued by a piercing flare.

verses.text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ

translations.translation: So ask them [O Prophet], which is harder to create: them or other marvels of Our creation? Indeed, We created them from a sticky clay.

verses.text: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ

translations.translation: In fact, you are astonished [by their denial], while they ridicule [you].

verses.text: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا۟ لَا يَذْكُرُونَ

translations.translation: When they are reminded, they are never mindful.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ

translations.translation: And whenever they see a sign, they make fun of it,

verses.text: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: saying, “This is nothing but pure magic.

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

translations.translation: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

verses.text: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ

translations.translation: And our forefathers as well?”

verses.text: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَٰخِرُونَ

translations.translation: Say, “Yes! And you will be fully humbled.”

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

translations.translation: It will only take one Blast, then at once they will see [it all].

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: They will cry, “Oh, woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!”

verses.text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “This is the Day of [Final] Decision which you used to deny.”

verses.text: ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ

translations.translation: [Allah will say to the angels,] “Gather [all] the wrongdoers along with their peers, and whatever they used to worship

verses.text: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: instead of Allah, then lead them [all] to the path of Hell.

verses.text: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْـُٔولُونَ

translations.translation: And detain them, for they must be questioned.”

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ

translations.translation: [Then they will be asked,] “What is the matter with you that you can no longer help each other?”

verses.text: بَلْ هُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ

translations.translation: In fact, on that Day they will be [fully] submissive.

verses.text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.translation: They will turn on each other, throwing blame.

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.translation: The misled will say, “It was you who deluded us away from what is right.”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: The misleaders will reply, “No! You disbelieved on your own.

verses.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ

translations.translation: We had no authority over you. In fact, you yourselves were a transgressing people.

verses.text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

translations.translation: The decree of our Lord has come to pass against us [all]: we will certainly taste [the punishment].

verses.text: فَأَغْوَيْنَـٰكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَـٰوِينَ

translations.translation: We caused you to deviate, for we ourselves were deviant.”

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ

translations.translation: Surely on that Day they will [all] share in the punishment.

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translations.translation: That is certainly how We deal with the wicked.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ

translations.translation: For whenever it was said to them [in the world], “There is no god [worthy of worship] except Allah,” they acted arrogantly

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ

translations.translation: and argued, “Should we really abandon our gods for a mad poet?”

verses.text: بَلْ جَآءَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: In fact, he came with the truth, confirming [earlier] messengers.

verses.text: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَآئِقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْأَلِيمِ

translations.translation: You will certainly taste the painful torment,

verses.text: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: and will only be rewarded for what you used to do.

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

translations.translation: They will have a known provision:

verses.text: فَوَٰكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ

translations.translation: fruits [of every type]. And they will be honoured

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translations.translation: in the Gardens of Bliss,

verses.text: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ

translations.translation: facing each other on thrones.

verses.text: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍۭ

translations.translation: A drink [of pure wine] will be passed around to them from a flowing stream:

verses.text: بَيْضَآءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ

translations.translation: crystal-white, delicious to drink.

verses.text: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ

translations.translation: It will neither harm [them], nor will they be intoxicated by it.

verses.text: وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ عِينٌ

translations.translation: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and gorgeous eyes,

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ

translations.translation: as if they were pristine pearls.

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.translation: Then they will turn to one another inquisitively.

verses.text: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ

translations.translation: One of them will say, “I once had a companion [in the world]

verses.text: يَقُولُ أَءِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ

translations.translation: who used to ask [me], ‘Do you actually believe [in resurrection]?

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

translations.translation: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be brought to judgment?’”

verses.text: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ

translations.translation: He will [then] ask, “Would you care to see [his fate]?”

verses.text: فَٱطَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: Then he [and the others] will look and spot him in the midst of the Hellfire.

verses.text: قَالَ تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ

translations.translation: He will [then] say, “By Allah! You nearly ruined me.

verses.text: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ

translations.translation: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I [too] would have certainly been among those brought [to Hell].”

verses.text: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ

translations.translation: [Then he will ask his fellow believers,] “Can you imagine that we will never die,

verses.text: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

translations.translation: except our first death, nor be punished [like the others]?”

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

translations.translation: This is truly the ultimate triumph.

verses.text: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ ٱلْعَـٰمِلُونَ

translations.translation: For such [honour] all should strive.

verses.text: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

translations.translation: Is this [bliss] a better accommodation or the tree of Zaqqûm?

verses.text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.translation: We have surely made it a test for the wrongdoers.

verses.text: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: Indeed, it is a tree that grows in the depths of Hell,

verses.text: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُۥ رُءُوسُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ

translations.translation: bearing fruit like devils’ heads.

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ

translations.translation: The evildoers will certainly [be left to] eat from it, filling up their bellies with it.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ

translations.translation: Then on top of that they will be given a blend of boiling drink.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: Then they will ultimately return to [their place in] Hell.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا۟ ءَابَآءَهُمْ ضَآلِّينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, they found their forefathers astray,

verses.text: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ

translations.translation: so they rushed in their footsteps!

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: And surely most of the earlier generations had strayed before them,

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ

translations.translation: although We had certainly sent warners among them.

verses.text: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

translations.translation: See then what was the end of those who had been warned.

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ نَادَىٰنَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ

translations.translation: Indeed, Noah cried out to Us, and how excellent are We in responding!

verses.text: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.translation: We delivered him and his family from the great distress,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُۥ هُمُ ٱلْبَاقِينَ

translations.translation: and made his descendants the sole survivors.

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: And We blessed him [with honourable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: “Peace be upon Noah among all peoples.”

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: [For] he was truly one of Our faithful servants.

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

translations.translation: Then We drowned the others.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ لَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ

translations.translation: And indeed, one of those who followed his way was Abraham.

verses.text: إِذْ جَآءَ رَبَّهُۥ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ

translations.translation: [Remember] when he came to his Lord with a pure heart,

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.translation: and said to his father and his people, “What are you worshipping?

verses.text: أَئِفْكًا ءَالِهَةً دُونَ ٱللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ

translations.translation: Is it false gods that you desire instead of Allah?

verses.text: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: What then do you expect from the Lord of all worlds?”

verses.text: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِى ٱلنُّجُومِ

translations.translation: He later looked up to the stars [in contemplation],

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنِّى سَقِيمٌ

translations.translation: then said, “I am really sick.”

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ

translations.translation: So they turned their backs on him and went away.

verses.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.translation: Then he [stealthily] advanced towards their gods, and said [mockingly], “Will you not eat [your offerings]?

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ

translations.translation: What is wrong with you that you cannot speak?”

verses.text: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًۢا بِٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.translation: Then he swiftly turned on them, striking [them] with his right hand.

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ

translations.translation: Later, his people came rushing towards him [furiously].

verses.text: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ

translations.translation: He argued, “How can you worship what you carve [with your own hands],

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: when it is Allah Who created you and whatever you do?”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: They said [to one another], “Build him a furnace and cast him into the blazing fire.”

verses.text: فَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ

translations.translation: And so they sought to harm him, but We made them inferior.

verses.text: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ

translations.translation: He later said, “I am leaving [in obedience] to my Lord. He will guide me.

verses.text: رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.translation: My Lord! Bless me with righteous offspring.”

verses.text: فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ حَلِيمٍ

translations.translation: So We gave him good news of a forbearing son.

verses.text: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ

translations.translation: Then when the boy reached the age to work with him, Abraham said, “O my dear son! I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you. So tell me what you think.” He replied, “O my dear father! Do as you are commanded. Allah willing, you will find me steadfast.”

verses.text: فَلَمَّآ أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُۥ لِلْجَبِينِ

translations.translation: Then when they submitted [to Allah’s Will], and Abraham laid him on the side of his forehead [for sacrifice],

verses.text: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ أَن يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ

translations.translation: We called out to him, “O Abraham!

verses.text: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: You have already fulfilled the vision.” Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْبَلَـٰٓؤُا۟ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translations.translation: That was truly a revealing test.

verses.text: وَفَدَيْنَـٰهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ

translations.translation: And We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice,

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: and blessed Abraham [with honourable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ

translations.translation: “Peace be upon Abraham.”

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: This is how We reward the good-doers.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.

verses.text: وَبَشَّرْنَـٰهُ بِإِسْحَـٰقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.translation: We [later] gave him good news of Isaac—a prophet, and one of the righteous.

verses.text: وَبَـٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ

translations.translation: We blessed him and Isaac as well. Some of their descendants did good, while others clearly wronged themselves.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ

translations.translation: And We certainly showed favour to Moses and Aaron,

verses.text: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.translation: and delivered them and their people from the great distress.

verses.text: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُمْ فَكَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ

translations.translation: We helped them so it was they who prevailed.

verses.text: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ٱلْمُسْتَبِينَ

translations.translation: We gave them the clear Scripture,

verses.text: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ

translations.translation: and guided them to the Straight Path.

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: And We blessed them [with honourable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ

translations.translation: “Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.”

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: They were truly [two] of Our faithful servants.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: And Elias was indeed one of the messengers.

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

translations.translation: [Remember] when he said to his people, “Will you not fear [Allah]?

verses.text: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ

translations.translation: Do you call upon [the idol of] Ba’l and abandon the Best of Creators—

verses.text: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

translations.translation: But they rejected him, so they will certainly be brought [for punishment].

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: We blessed him [with honourable mention] among later generations:

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰٓ إِلْ يَاسِينَ

translations.translation: “Peace be upon Elias.”

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: And Lot was indeed one of the messengers.

verses.text: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.translation: [Remember] when We delivered him and all of his family,

verses.text: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِى ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ

translations.translation: except an old woman, who was one of the doomed.

verses.text: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا ٱلْـَٔاخَرِينَ

translations.translation: Then We [utterly] destroyed the rest.

verses.text: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ

translations.translation: You [Meccans] certainly pass by their ruins day

verses.text: وَبِٱلَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.translation: and night. Will you not then understand?

verses.text: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: And Jonah was indeed one of the messengers.

verses.text: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

translations.translation: [Remember] when he fled to the overloaded ship.

verses.text: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُدْحَضِينَ

translations.translation: Then [to save it from sinking,] he drew straws [with other passengers]. He lost [and was thrown overboard].

verses.text: فَٱلْتَقَمَهُ ٱلْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ

translations.translation: Then the whale engulfed him while he was blameworthy.

verses.text: فَلَوْلَآ أَنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسَبِّحِينَ

translations.translation: Had he not [constantly] glorified [Allah],

verses.text: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.translation: he would have certainly remained in its belly until the Day of Resurrection.

verses.text: فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ

translations.translation: But We cast him onto the open [shore], [totally] worn out,

verses.text: وَأَنۢبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ

translations.translation: and caused a squash plant to grow over him.

verses.text: وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ

translations.translation: We [later] sent him [back] to [his city of] at least one hundred thousand people,

verses.text: فَـَٔامَنُوا۟ فَمَتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

translations.translation: who then believed [in him], so We allowed them enjoyment for a while.

verses.text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ ٱلْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ

translations.translation: Ask them [O Prophet] if your Lord has daughters, while the pagans [prefer to] have sons.

verses.text: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَـٰثًا وَهُمْ شَـٰهِدُونَ

translations.translation: Or [ask them] if We created the angels as females right before their eyes.

verses.text: أَلَآ إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ

translations.translation: Indeed, it is one of their [outrageous] fabrications to say,

verses.text: وَلَدَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ

translations.translation: “Allah has children.” They are simply liars.

verses.text: أَصْطَفَى ٱلْبَنَاتِ عَلَى ٱلْبَنِينَ

translations.translation: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ

translations.translation: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

verses.text: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.translation: Will you not then be mindful?

verses.text: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: Or do you have [any] compelling proof?

verses.text: فَأْتُوا۟ بِكِتَـٰبِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.translation: Then bring [us] your scripture, if what you say is true!

verses.text: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

translations.translation: They have also established a [marital] relationship between Him and the jinn. Yet the jinn [themselves] know well that such people will certainly be brought [for punishment].

verses.text: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

translations.translation: Glorified is Allah far above what they claim!

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

verses.text: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.translation: Surely you [pagans] and whatever [idols] you worship

verses.text: مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَـٰتِنِينَ

translations.translation: can never lure [anyone] away from Him

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: except those [destined] to burn in Hell.

verses.text: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

translations.translation: [The angels respond,] “There is not one of us without an assigned station [of worship].

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلصَّآفُّونَ

translations.translation: We are indeed the ones lined up in ranks [for Allah].

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْمُسَبِّحُونَ

translations.translation: And we are indeed the ones [constantly] glorifying [His praise].”

verses.text: وَإِن كَانُوا۟ لَيَقُولُونَ

translations.translation: They certainly used to say,

verses.text: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: “If only we had a Reminder like [those of] earlier peoples,

verses.text: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.translation: we would have truly been Allah’s devoted servants.”

verses.text: فَكَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: But [now] they reject it, so they will soon know.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: Our Word has already gone forth to Our servants, the messengers,

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ ٱلْمَنصُورُونَ

translations.translation: that they would surely be helped,

verses.text: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ

translations.translation: and that Our forces will certainly prevail.

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

translations.translation: So turn away from the deniers for a while [O Prophet].

verses.text: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: You will see [what will happen to] them, and they too will see!

verses.text: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

translations.translation: Do they [really] wish to hasten Our punishment?

verses.text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

translations.translation: Yet when it descends upon them: how evil will that morning be for those who had been warned!

verses.text: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

translations.translation: And turn away from them for a while.

verses.text: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: You will see, and they too will see!

verses.text: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

translations.translation: Glorified is your Lord—the Lord of Honour and Power—above what they claim!

verses.text: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَى ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.translation: Peace be upon the messengers.

verses.text: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: And praise be to Allah—Lord of all worlds.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ

translations.translation: Ṣãd. By the Quran, full of reminders!

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ

translations.translation: [This is the truth,] yet the disbelievers are [entrenched] in arrogance and opposition.

verses.text: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ

translations.translation: [Imagine] how many peoples We destroyed before them, and they cried out when it was too late to escape.

verses.text: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ

translations.translation: Now, the pagans are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, “This is a magician, a total liar!

verses.text: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ

translations.translation: Has he reduced [all] the gods to One God? Indeed, this is something totally astonishing.”

verses.text: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ

translations.translation: The chiefs among them went forth saying, “Carry on, and stand firm in devotion to your gods. Certainly this is just a scheme [for power].

verses.text: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ

translations.translation: We have never heard of this in the previous faith. This is nothing but a fabrication.

verses.text: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ

translations.translation: Has the Reminder been revealed [only] to him out of [all of] us?” In fact, they are [only] in doubt of My [revealed] Reminder. In fact, [they do so because] they have not yet tasted My punishment.

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ

translations.translation: Or [is it because] they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lord—the Almighty, the Giver [of all bounties].

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ

translations.translation: Or [is it because] the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between belongs to them? Let them then climb their way [to heaven, if their claim is true].

verses.text: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ

translations.translation: This is just another [enemy] force bound for defeat out there.

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ

translations.translation: Before them, the people of Noah denied [the truth], as did ’Âd, Pharaoh of the mighty structures,

verses.text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ

translations.translation: Thamûd, the people of Lot, and the residents of the Forest. These were [all] enemy forces.

verses.text: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

translations.translation: Each rejected their messenger, so My punishment was justified.

verses.text: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ

translations.translation: These [pagans] are awaiting nothing but a single Blast that cannot be stopped.

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

translations.translation: They say [mockingly], “Our Lord! Hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Reckoning.”

verses.text: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.translation: Be patient [O Prophet] with what they say. And remember Our servant, David, the man of strength. Indeed, he [constantly] turned [to Allah].

verses.text: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ

translations.translation: We truly subjected the mountains to hymn [Our praises] along with him in the evening and after sunrise.

verses.text: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.translation: And [We subjected] the birds, flocking together. All turned to him [echoing his hymns].

verses.text: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ

translations.translation: We strengthened his kingship, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment.

verses.text: وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ

translations.translation: Has the story of the two plaintiffs, who scaled the [wall of David’s] sanctuary, reached you [O Prophet]?

verses.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ

translations.translation: When they came into David’s presence, he was startled by them. They said, “Have no fear. [We are merely] two in a dispute: one of us has wronged the other. So judge between us with truth—do not go beyond [it]—and guide us to the right way.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ

translations.translation: This is my brother. He has ninety-nine sheep while I have [only] one. [Still] he asked me to give it up to him, overwhelming me with [his] argument.”

verses.text: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩

translations.translation: David [eventually] ruled, “He has definitely wronged you in demanding [to add] your sheep to his. And certainly many partners wrong each other, except those who believe and do good—but how few are they!” Then David realized that We had tested him so he asked for his Lord’s forgiveness, fell down in prostration, and turned [to Him in repentance].

verses.text: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.translation: So We forgave that for him. And he will indeed have [a status of] closeness to Us and an honourable destination!

verses.text: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ

translations.translation: [We instructed him:] “O David! We have surely made you an authority in the land, so judge between people with truth. And do not follow [your] desires or they will lead you astray from Allah’s Way. Surely those who go astray from Allah’s Way will suffer a severe punishment for neglecting the Day of Reckoning.”

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.translation: We have not created the heavens and earth and everything in between without purpose—as the disbelievers think. So woe to the disbelievers because of the Fire!

verses.text: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ

translations.translation: Or should We treat those who believe and do good like those who make mischief throughout the land? Or should We treat the righteous like the wicked?

verses.text: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.translation: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you [O Prophet] so that they may contemplate its verses, and people of reason may be mindful.

verses.text: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.translation: And We blessed David with Solomon—what an excellent servant [he was]! Indeed, he [constantly] turned [to Allah].

verses.text: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ

translations.translation: [Remember] when the well-trained, swift horses were paraded before him in the evening.

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ

translations.translation: He then proclaimed, “I am truly in love with [these] fine things out of remembrance for my Lord,” until they went out of sight.

verses.text: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ

translations.translation: [He ordered,] “Bring them back to me!” Then he began to rub down their legs and necks.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ

translations.translation: And indeed, We tested Solomon, placing a [deformed] body on his throne, then he turned [to Allah in repentance].

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ

translations.translation: He prayed, “My Lord! Forgive me, and grant me an authority that will never be matched by anyone after me. You are indeed the Giver [of all bounties].”

verses.text: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ

translations.translation: So We subjected to him the wind, blowing gently at his command to wherever he pleased.

verses.text: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ

translations.translation: And [We subjected to him] every builder and diver of the jinn,

verses.text: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ

translations.translation: and others bound together in chains.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ

translations.translation: [Allah said,] “This is Our gift, so give or withhold [as you wish], never to be called to account.”

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.translation: And he will indeed have [a status of] closeness to Us and an honourable destination!

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ

translations.translation: And remember Our servant Job, when he cried out to his Lord, “Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering.”

verses.text: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ

translations.translation: [We responded,] “Stomp your foot: [now] here is a cool [and refreshing] spring for washing and drinking.”

verses.text: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.translation: And We gave him back his family, twice as many, as a mercy from Us and a lesson for people of reason.

verses.text: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

translations.translation: [And We said to him,] “Take in your hand a bundle of grass, and strike [your wife] with it, and do not break your oath.” We truly found him patient. What an excellent servant [he was]! Indeed, he [constantly] turned [to Allah].

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ

translations.translation: And remember Our servants: Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—the men of strength and insight.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ

translations.translation: We truly chose them for the honour of proclaiming the Hereafter.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ

translations.translation: And in Our sight they are truly among the chosen and the finest.

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ

translations.translation: Also remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Ⱬul-Kifl. All are among the best.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.translation: This is [all] a reminder. And the righteous will certainly have an honourable destination:

verses.text: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ

translations.translation: the Gardens of Eternity, whose gates will be open for them.

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ

translations.translation: There they will recline, calling for abundant fruit and drink.

verses.text: وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ

translations.translation: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and equal age.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

translations.translation: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

translations.translation: This is indeed Our provision that will never end.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ

translations.translation: That is that. And the transgressors will certainly have the worst destination:

verses.text: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ

translations.translation: Hell, where they will burn. What an evil place to rest!

verses.text: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ

translations.translation: Let them then taste this: boiling water and [oozing] pus,

verses.text: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ

translations.translation: and other torments of the same sort!

verses.text: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.translation: [The misleaders will say to one another,] “Here is a crowd [of followers] being thrown in with us. They are not welcome, [for] they [too] will burn in the Fire.”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ

translations.translation: The followers will respond, “No! You are not welcome! You brought this upon us. What an evil place for settlement!”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ

translations.translation: Adding, “Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, double their punishment in the Fire.”

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ

translations.translation: The tyrants will ask [one another], “But why do we not see those we considered to be lowly?

verses.text: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ

translations.translation: Were we wrong in mocking them [in the world]? Or do our eyes [just] fail to see them [in the Fire]?”

verses.text: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.translation: This dispute between the residents of the Fire will certainly come to pass.

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “I am only a warner. And there is no god [worthy of worship] except Allah—the One, the Supreme.

verses.text: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ

translations.translation: [He is the] Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between—the Almighty, Most Forgiving.”

verses.text: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ

translations.translation: Say, “This [Quran] is momentous news,

verses.text: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ

translations.translation: from which you [pagans] are turning away.”

verses.text: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

translations.translation: [And say,] “I had no knowledge of the highest assembly [in heaven] when they differed [concerning Adam].

verses.text: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: What is revealed to me is that I am only sent with a clear warning.”

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ

translations.translation: [Remember, O  Prophet] when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from clay.

verses.text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ

translations.translation: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own [creation] breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”

verses.text: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ

translations.translation: So the angels prostrated all together—

verses.text: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.translation: but not Iblîs, who acted arrogantly, becoming unfaithful.

verses.text: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ

translations.translation: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What prevented you from prostrating to what I created with My Own Hands? Did you [just] become proud? Or have you always been arrogant?”

verses.text: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ

translations.translation: He replied, “I am better than he is: You created me from fire and him from clay.”

verses.text: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ

translations.translation: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: And surely upon you is My condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.translation: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”

verses.text: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ

translations.translation: Allah said, “You will be delayed

verses.text: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ

translations.translation: until the appointed Day.”

verses.text: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.translation: Satan said, “By Your Glory! I will certainly mislead them all,

verses.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ

translations.translation: except Your chosen servants among them.”

verses.text: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ

translations.translation: Allah concluded, “The truth is—and I [only] say the truth—:

verses.text: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.translation: I will surely fill up Hell with you and whoever follows you from among them, all together.”

verses.text: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “I do not ask you for any reward for this [Quran], nor do I pretend to be someone I am not.

verses.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: It is only a reminder to the whole world.

verses.text: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ

translations.translation: And you will certainly know its truth before long.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

translations.translation: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَٱعْبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, We have sent down the Book to you [O Prophet] in truth, so worship Allah [alone], being sincerely devoted to Him.

verses.text: أَلَا لِلَّهِ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْخَالِصُ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِى مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى مَنْ هُوَ كَـٰذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ

translations.translation: Indeed, sincere devotion is due [only] to Allah. As for those who take other lords besides Him, [saying,] “We worship them only so they may bring us closer to Allah,” surely Allah will judge between all regarding what they differed about. Allah certainly does not guide whoever persists in lying and disbelief.

verses.text: لَّوْ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّٱصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

translations.translation: Had it been Allah’s Will to have offspring, He could have chosen whatever He willed of His creation. Glory be to Him! He is Allah—the One, the Supreme.

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ عَلَى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ ٱلنَّهَارَ عَلَى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِى لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ

translations.translation: He created the heavens and the earth for a purpose. He wraps the night around the day, and wraps the day around the night. And He has subjected the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. He is truly the Almighty, Most Forgiving.

verses.text: خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَزْوَٰجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِّنۢ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍ ثَلَـٰثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ

translations.translation: He created you [all] from a single soul, then from it He made its mate. And He produced for you four pairs of cattle. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers [in stages], one development after another, in three layers of darkness. That is Allah—your Lord! All authority belongs to Him. There is no god [worthy of worship] except Him. How can you then be turned away?

verses.text: إِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَنكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ ٱلْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِن تَشْكُرُوا۟ يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

translations.translation: If you disbelieve, then [know that] Allah is truly not in need of you, nor does He approve of disbelief from His servants. But if you become grateful [through faith], He will appreciate that from you. No soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you of what you used to do. He certainly knows best what is [hidden] in the heart.

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُۥ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُۥ نِعْمَةً مِّنْهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مِن قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا لِّيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ

translations.translation: When one is touched with hardship, they cry out to their Lord, turning to Him [alone]. But as soon as He showers them with blessings from Him, they [totally] forget the One they had cried to earlier, and set up equals to Allah to mislead [others] from His Way. Say, [O Prophet,] “Enjoy your disbelief for a little while! You will certainly be one of the inmates of the Fire.”

verses.text: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَـٰنِتٌ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَآئِمًا يَحْذَرُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُوا۟ رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِى ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.translation: [Are they better] or those who worship [their Lord] devoutly in the hours of the night, prostrating and standing, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of their Lord? Say, [O Prophet,] “Are those who know equal to those who do not know?” None will be mindful [of this] except people of reason.

verses.text: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ

translations.translation: Say [O Prophet, that Allah says], “O My servants who believe! Be mindful of your Lord. Those who do good in this world will have a good reward. And Allah’s earth is spacious. Only those who endure patiently will be given their reward without limit.”

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

translations.translation: Say, “I am commanded to worship Allah, being sincerely devoted to Him [alone].

verses.text: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

translations.translation: And I am commanded to be the first of those who submit [to His Will].”

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

translations.translation: Say, “I truly fear—if I were to disobey my Lord—the torment of a tremendous Day.”

verses.text: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى

translations.translation: Say, “It is [only] Allah that I worship, being sincere in my devotion to Him.

verses.text: فَٱعْبُدُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translations.translation: Worship then whatever [gods] you want instead of Him.” Say, “The [true] losers are those who will lose themselves and their families on Judgment Day. That is indeed the clearest loss.”

verses.text: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥ ۚ يَـٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ

translations.translation: They will have layers of fire above and below them. That is what Allah warns His servants with. So fear Me, O  My servants!

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَنَبُوا۟ ٱلطَّـٰغُوتَ أَن يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ

translations.translation: And those who shun the worship of false gods, turning to Allah [alone], will have good news. So give good news to My servants [O Prophet]—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُۥٓ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَدَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.translation: those who listen to what is said and follow the best of it. These are the ones [rightly] guided by Allah, and these are [truly] the people of reason.

verses.text: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ

translations.translation: What about those against whom the decree of torment has been justified? Is it you [O Prophet] who will then save those bound for the Fire?

verses.text: لَـٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِّن فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَّبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ

translations.translation: But those mindful of their Lord will have [elevated] mansions, built one above the other, under which rivers flow. [That is] the promise of Allah. [And] Allah never fails in [His] promise.

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَسَلَكَهُۥ يَنَـٰبِيعَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرْعًا مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَٰنُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُۥ حُطَـٰمًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ

translations.translation: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky—channelling it through streams in the earth—then produces with it crops of various colours, then they dry up and you see them wither, and then He reduces them to chaff? Surely in this is a reminder for people of reason.

verses.text: أَفَمَن شَرَحَ ٱللَّهُ صَدْرَهُۥ لِلْإِسْلَـٰمِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْقَـٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: Can [the misguided be like] those whose hearts Allah has opened to Islam, so they are enlightened by their Lord? So woe to those whose hearts are hardened at the remembrance of Allah! It is they who are clearly astray.

verses.text: ٱللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْحَدِيثِ كِتَـٰبًا مُّتَشَـٰبِهًا مَّثَانِىَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ يَهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْ هَادٍ

translations.translation: [It is] Allah [Who] has sent down the best message—a Book of perfect consistency and repeated lessons—which causes the skin [and hearts] of those who fear their Lord to tremble, then their skin and hearts soften at the mention of [the mercy of] Allah. That is the guidance of Allah, through which He guides whoever He wills. But whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

verses.text: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِى بِوَجْهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ

translations.translation: Are those who will only have their [bare] faces to shield themselves from the awful torment on Judgment Day [better than those in Paradise]? It will [then] be said to the wrongdoers: “Reap what you sowed!”

verses.text: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

translations.translation: Those before them [also] rejected [the truth], then the torment came upon them from where they least expected.

verses.text: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخِزْىَ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: So Allah made them taste humiliation in this worldly life, but far worse is the punishment of the Hereafter, if only they knew.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِى هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.translation: We have certainly set forth every [kind of] lesson for people in this Quran, so perhaps they will be mindful.

verses.text: قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِى عِوَجٍ لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ

translations.translation: [It is] a Quran [revealed] in Arabic without any crookedness, so perhaps they will be conscious [of Allah].

verses.text: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَّجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَـٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: Allah sets forth the parable of a slave owned by several quarrelsome masters, and a slave owned by only one master. Are they equal in condition? Praise be to Allah! In fact, most of them do not know.

verses.text: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُم مَّيِّتُونَ

translations.translation: You [O Prophet] will certainly die, and they will die too.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
