You might have trampled them underfoot, incurring guilt for [what you did to] them unknowingly. That was so Allah may admit into His mercy whoever He wills. Had those [unknown] believers stood apart, We would have certainly inflicted a painful punishment on the disbelievers.

verses.text: إِذْ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًا

translations.translation: [Remember] when the disbelievers had filled their hearts with pride—the pride of [pre-Islamic] ignorance—then Allah sent down His serenity upon His Messenger and the believers, inspiring them to uphold the declaration of faith, for they were better entitled and more worthy of it. And Allah has [perfect] knowledge of all things.

verses.text: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ ٱلرُّءْيَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا۟ فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا

translations.translation: Indeed, Allah will fulfil His Messenger’s vision in all truth: Allah willing, you will surely enter the Sacred Mosque, in security—[some with] heads shaved and [others with] hair shortened—without fear. He knew what you did not know, so He first granted you the triumph at hand.

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًا

translations.translation: He is the One Who has sent His Messenger with [right] guidance and the religion of truth, making it prevail over all others. And sufficient is Allah as a Witness.

verses.text: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَىٰهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِى وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلسُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْـَٔهُۥ فَـَٔازَرَهُۥ فَٱسْتَغْلَظَ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِۦ يُعْجِبُ ٱلزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًۢا

translations.translation: Muḥammad is the Messenger of Allah. And those with him are firm with the disbelievers and compassionate with one another. You see them bowing and prostrating [in prayer], seeking Allah’s bounty and pleasure. The sign [of brightness can be seen] on their faces from the trace of prostrating [in prayer]. This is their description in the Torah. And their parable in the Gospel is that of a seed that sprouts its [tiny] branches, making it strong. Then it becomes thick, standing firmly on its stem, to the delight of the planters—in this way Allah makes the believers a source of dismay for the disbelievers. To those of them who believe and do good, Allah has promised forgiveness and a great reward.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

translations.translation: O believers! Do not proceed [in any matter] before [a decree from] Allah and His Messenger. And fear Allah. Surely Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَرْفَعُوٓا۟ أَصْوَٰتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا۟ لَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ

translations.translation: O believers! Do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet, nor speak loudly to him as you do to one another, or your deeds will become void while you are unaware.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَٰتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱمْتَحَنَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

translations.translation: Indeed, those who lower their voices in the presence of Allah’s Messenger are the ones whose hearts Allah has refined for righteousness. They will have forgiveness and a great reward.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلْحُجُرَٰتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ

translations.translation: Indeed, most of those who call out to you [O Prophet] from outside [your] private quarters have no understanding [of manners].

verses.text: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translations.translation: Had they been patient until you could come out to them, it would have certainly been better for them. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن جَآءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌۢ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓا۟ أَن تُصِيبُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بِجَهَـٰلَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَـٰدِمِينَ

translations.translation: O believers, if an evildoer brings you any news, verify [it] so you do not harm people unknowingly, becoming regretful for what you have done.

verses.text: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِى كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْكُفْرَ وَٱلْفُسُوقَ وَٱلْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّٰشِدُونَ

translations.translation: And keep in mind that Allah’s Messenger is [still] in your midst. If he were to yield to you in many matters, you would surely suffer [the consequences]. But Allah has endeared faith to you, making it appealing in your hearts. And He has made disbelief, rebelliousness, and disobedience detestable to you. Those are the ones rightly guided.

verses.text: فَضْلًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

translations.translation: [This is] a bounty and a blessing from Allah. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

verses.text: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٱقْتَتَلُوا۟ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتْ إِحْدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّتِى تَبْغِى حَتَّىٰ تَفِىٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَآءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا بِٱلْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُقْسِطِينَ

translations.translation: And if two groups of believers fight each other, then make peace between them. But if one of them transgresses against the other, then fight against the transgressing group until they [are willing to] submit to the rule of Allah. If they do so, then make peace between both [groups] in all fairness and act justly. Surely Allah loves those who uphold justice.

verses.text: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

translations.translation: The believers are but one brotherhood, so make peace between your brothers. And be mindful of Allah so you may be shown mercy.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَآءٌ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا۟ بِٱلْأَلْقَـٰبِ ۖ بِئْسَ ٱلِٱسْمُ ٱلْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

translations.translation: O believers! Do not let some [men] ridicule others, they may be better than them, nor let [some] women ridicule other women, they may be better than them. Do not defame one another, nor call each other by offensive nicknames. How evil it is to act rebelliously after having faith! And whoever does not repent, it is they who are the [true] wrongdoers.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا۟ وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translations.translation: O  believers! Avoid many suspicions, [for] indeed, some suspicions are sinful. And do not spy, nor backbite one another. Would any of you like to eat the flesh of their dead brother? You would despise that! And fear Allah. Surely Allah is [the] Accepter of Repentance, Most Merciful.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَـٰكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتْقَىٰكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ

translations.translation: O humanity! Indeed, We created you from a male and a female, and made you into peoples and tribes so that you may [get to] know one another. Surely the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous among you. Allah is truly All-Knowing, All-Aware.

verses.text: قَالَتِ ٱلْأَعْرَابُ ءَامَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوٓا۟ أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنُ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَـٰلِكُمْ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translations.translation: [Some of] the nomadic Arabs say, “We believe.” Say, [O Prophet,] “You have not believed. But say, ‘We have submitted,’ for faith has not yet entered your hearts. But if you obey Allah and His Messenger [wholeheartedly], He will not discount anything from [the reward of] your deeds. Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”

verses.text: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ

translations.translation: The [true] believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger—never doubting—and strive with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah. They are the ones true in faith.

verses.text: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ

translations.translation: Say, “Do you inform Allah of your faith, when Allah [already] knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth? And Allah has [perfect] knowledge of all things.”

verses.text: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا۟ ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا۟ عَلَىَّ إِسْلَـٰمَكُم ۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَىٰكُمْ لِلْإِيمَـٰنِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.translation: They regard their acceptance of Islam as a favour to you. Tell [them, O  Prophet], “Do not regard your Islam as a favour to me. Rather, it is Allah Who has done you a favour by guiding you to the faith, if [indeed] you are faithful.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: Surely Allah knows the unseen of the heavens and earth. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ

translations.translation: Qãf. By the glorious Quran!

verses.text: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ

translations.translation: [All will be resurrected,] yet the deniers are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves [warning of resurrection]. So the disbelievers say, “This is an astonishing thing!

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ

translations.translation: [Will we be returned to life,] when we are dead and reduced to dust? Such a return is impossible.”

verses.text: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ

translations.translation: We certainly know what the earth consumes of them [after their death], and with us is a well-preserved Record.

verses.text: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ

translations.translation: In fact, they reject the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a confused state.

verses.text: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ

translations.translation: Have they not then looked at the sky above them: how We built it and adorned it [with stars], leaving it flawless?

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ

translations.translation: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and produced in it every type of pleasant plant—

verses.text: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ

translations.translation: [all as] an insight and a reminder to every servant who turns [to Allah].

verses.text: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ

translations.translation: And We send down blessed rain from the sky, bringing forth gardens and grains for harvest,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ

translations.translation: and towering palm trees [loaded] with clustered fruit,

verses.text: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ

translations.translation: [as] a provision for [Our] servants. And with this [rain] We revive a lifeless land. Similar is the emergence [from the graves].

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

translations.translation: Before them, the people of Noah denied [the truth,] as did the people of the Water-pit, Thamûd,

verses.text: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ

translations.translation: ’Ȃd, Pharaoh, the kinfolk of Lot,

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

translations.translation: the residents of the Forest, and the people of Tubba’. Each rejected [their] messenger, so My warning was fulfilled.

verses.text: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ

translations.translation: Were We incapable of creating [them] the first time? In fact, they are in doubt about [their] re-creation.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ

translations.translation: Indeed, [it is] We [Who] created humankind and [fully] know what their souls whisper to them, and We are closer to them than [their] jugular vein.

verses.text: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ

translations.translation: As the two recording-angels—[one] sitting to the right, and [the other to] the left—note [everything],

verses.text: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ

translations.translation: not a word does a person utter without having a [vigilant] observer ready [to write it down].

verses.text: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ

translations.translation: [Ultimately,] with the throes of death will come the truth. This is what you were trying to escape!

verses.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ

translations.translation: And the Trumpet will be blown. This is the Day [you were] warned of.

verses.text: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ

translations.translation: Each soul will come forth with an angel to drive it and another to testify.

verses.text: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ

translations.translation: [It will be said to the denier,] “You were totally heedless of this. Now We have lifted this veil of yours, so Today your sight is sharp!”

verses.text: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ

translations.translation: And one’s accompanying-angel will say, “Here is the record ready with me.”

verses.text: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ

translations.translation: [It will be said to both angels,] “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever,

verses.text: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ

translations.translation: withholder of good, transgressor, and doubter,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

translations.translation: who set up another god with Allah. So cast them into the severe punishment.”

verses.text: قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ

translations.translation: One’s [devilish] associate will say, “Our Lord! I did not make them transgress. Rather, they were far astray [on their own].”

verses.text: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ

translations.translation: Allah will respond, “Do not dispute in My presence, since I had already given you a warning.

verses.text: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ

translations.translation: My Word cannot be changed, nor am I unjust to [My] creation.”

verses.text: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ

translations.translation: [Beware of] the Day We will ask Hell, “Are you full [yet]?” And it will respond, “Are there any more?”

verses.text: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ

translations.translation: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far off.

verses.text: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ

translations.translation: [And it will be said to them,] “This is what you were promised, for whoever [constantly] turned [to Allah] and kept up [His commandments]—

verses.text: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ

translations.translation: who were in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing [Him], and have come with a heart turning [only to Him].

verses.text: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ

translations.translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of eternal life!”

verses.text: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ

translations.translation: There they will have whatever they desire, and with Us is [even] more.

verses.text: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

translations.translation: [Imagine] how many peoples We destroyed before them, who were far mightier than them. Then [when the torment came,] they [desperately] sought refuge in the land. [But] was there any escape?

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ

translations.translation: Surely in this is a reminder for whoever has a [mindful] heart and lends an attentive ear.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, and We were not [even] touched with fatigue.

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ

translations.translation: So be patient [O Prophet] with what they say. And glorify the praises of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset.

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ

translations.translation: And glorify Him during part of the night and after the prayers.

verses.text: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ

translations.translation: And listen! On the Day the caller will call out from a near place,

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ

translations.translation: the Day all will hear the [mighty] Blast in [all] truth, that will be the Day of emergence [from the graves].

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ

translations.translation: It is certainly We Who give life and cause death. And to Us is the final return.

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ

translations.translation: [Beware of] the Day the earth will split open, letting them rush forth. That will be an easy gathering for Us.

verses.text: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ

translations.translation: We know best what they say. And you [O Prophet] are not [there] to compel them [to believe]. So remind with the Quran [only] those who fear My warning.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا

translations.translation: By the winds scattering [dust],

verses.text: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا

translations.translation: and [the clouds] loaded with rain,

verses.text: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا

translations.translation: and [the ships] gliding with ease,

verses.text: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا

translations.translation: and [the angels] administering affairs by [Allah’s] command!

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ

translations.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ

translations.translation: And the Judgment will certainly come to pass.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ

translations.translation: [And] by the heavens in their marvellous design!

verses.text: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ

translations.translation: Surely you are [lost] in conflicting views [regarding the truth].

verses.text: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ

translations.translation: Only those [destined to be] deluded are turned away from it.

verses.text: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ

translations.translation: Condemned are the liars—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ

translations.translation: those who are [steeped] in ignorance, totally heedless.

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: They ask [mockingly], “When is this Day of Judgment?”

verses.text: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ

translations.translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire.

verses.text: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “Taste your torment! This is what you sought to hasten.”

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs,

verses.text: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: [joyfully] receiving what their Lord will grant them. Before this [reward] they were truly good-doers [in the world]:

verses.text: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ

translations.translation: they used to sleep only little in the night,

verses.text: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ

translations.translation: and pray for forgiveness before dawn.

verses.text: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ

translations.translation: And in their wealth there was a rightful share [fulfilled] for the beggar and the poor.

verses.text: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ

translations.translation: There are [countless] signs on earth for those with sure faith,

verses.text: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: as there are within yourselves. Can you not see?

verses.text: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ

translations.translation: In heaven is your sustenance and whatever you are promised.

verses.text: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ

translations.translation: Then by the Lord of heaven and earth! [All] this is certainly as true as [the fact that] you can speak!

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ

translations.translation: Has the story of Abraham’s honoured guests reached you [O Prophet]?

verses.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ

translations.translation: [Remember] when they entered his presence and greeted [him with], “Peace!” He replied, “Peace [be upon you]!” [Then he said to himself,] “These people must be strangers!”

verses.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ

translations.translation: Then he slipped off to his family and brought a fat [roasted] calf,

verses.text: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.translation: and placed it before them, asking, “Will you not eat?”

verses.text: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ

translations.translation: [They did not eat,] so he grew fearful of them. They reassured [him], “Do not be afraid,” and gave him good news of a knowledgeable son.

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ

translations.translation: Then his wife came forward with a cry, clasping her forehead [in astonishment], exclaiming, “[A baby from] a barren, old woman!”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.translation: They replied, “Such has your Lord decreed. He is truly the All-Wise, All-Knowing.”

verses.text: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.translation: [Later,] Abraham asked, “What is your mission, O  messenger-angels?”

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ

translations.translation: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people,

verses.text: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ

translations.translation: to send upon them stones of [baked] clay,

verses.text: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ

translations.translation: marked by your Lord for the transgressors.”

verses.text: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: Then [before the torment] We evacuated the believers from the city.

verses.text: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

translations.translation: But We only found one family that had submitted [to Allah].

verses.text: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

translations.translation: And We have left a sign there [as a lesson] for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.text: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: And in [the story of] Moses [was another lesson,] when We sent him to Pharaoh with compelling proof,

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ

translations.translation: but Pharaoh was carried away by his power, saying [of Moses], “A magician or a madman!”

verses.text: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ

translations.translation: So We seized him and his soldiers, casting them into the sea while he was blameworthy.

verses.text: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ

translations.translation: And in [the story of] ’Âd [was another lesson,] when We sent against them the devastating wind.

verses.text: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

translations.translation: There was nothing it came upon that it did not reduce to ashes.

verses.text: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

translations.translation: And in [the story of] Thamûd [was another lesson,] when they were told, “Enjoy yourselves [only] for a [short] while.”

verses.text: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

translations.translation: Still they persisted in defying the commands of their Lord, so they were overtaken by a [mighty] blast while they were looking on.

verses.text: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ

translations.translation: Then they were not able to rise up, nor were they helped.

verses.text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ

translations.translation: And the people of Noah [had also been destroyed] earlier. They were truly a rebellious people.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ

translations.translation: We built the universe with [great] might, and We are certainly expanding [it].

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ

translations.translation: As for the earth, We spread it out. How superbly did We smooth it out!

verses.text: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.translation: And We created pairs of all things so perhaps you would be mindful.

verses.text: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: So [proclaim, O  Prophet]: “Flee to Allah! I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.

verses.text: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: And do not set up another god with Allah. I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.”

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ

translations.translation: Similarly, no messenger came to those before them without being told: “A magician or a madman!”

verses.text: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ

translations.translation: Have they passed this [cliché] down to one another? In fact, they have [all] been a transgressing people.

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ

translations.translation: So [now] turn away from them [O Prophet], for you will not be blamed.

verses.text: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.translation: But [continue to] remind. For certainly reminders benefit the believers.

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ

translations.translation: I did not create jinn and humans except to worship Me.

verses.text: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ

translations.translation: I seek no provision from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ

translations.translation: Indeed, Allah [alone] is the Supreme Provider—Lord of all Power, Ever Mighty.

verses.text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ

translations.translation: The wrongdoers will certainly have a share [of the torment] like that of their predecessors. So do not let them ask Me to hasten [it].

verses.text: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

translations.translation: Woe then to the disbelievers when they face their Day which they are warned of!

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلطُّورِ

translations.translation: By Mount Ṭûr!

verses.text: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ

translations.translation: And by the Book written

verses.text: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ

translations.translation: on open pages [for all to read]!

verses.text: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ

translations.translation: And by the [Sacred] House frequently visited!

verses.text: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ

translations.translation: And by the canopy raised [high]!

verses.text: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ

translations.translation: And by the seas set on fire!

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ

translations.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will come to pass—

verses.text: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ

translations.translation: none will avert it—

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا

translations.translation: on the Day the heavens will be shaken violently,

verses.text: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا

translations.translation: and the mountains will be blown away entirely.

verses.text: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Then woe on that Day to the deniers—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ

translations.translation: those who amuse themselves with falsehood!

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

translations.translation: [It is] the Day they will be fiercely shoved into the Fire of Hell.

verses.text: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “This is the Fire which you used to deny.

verses.text: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: Is this magic, or do you not see?

verses.text: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: Burn in it! It is the same whether you endure [it] patiently or not. You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in Gardens and bliss,

verses.text: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: enjoying whatever their Lord will have granted them. And their Lord will have protected them from the torment of the Hellfire.

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ

translations.translation: They will be reclining on thrones, [neatly] lined up [facing each other]. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ

translations.translation: As for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith, We will elevate their descendants to their rank, never discounting anything [of the reward] of their deeds. Every person will reap only what they sowed.

verses.text: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

translations.translation: And We will [continually] provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire.

verses.text: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ

translations.translation: They will pass around to each other a drink [of pure wine,] which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness.

verses.text: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ

translations.translation: And they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls.

verses.text: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.translation: They will turn to one another inquisitively.

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ

translations.translation: They will say, “Before [this reward] we used to be in awe [of Allah] in the midst of our people.

verses.text: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

translations.translation: So Allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of [Hell’s] scorching heat.

verses.text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translations.translation: Indeed, we used to call upon Him [alone] before. He is truly the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”

verses.text: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ

translations.translation: So [continue to] remind [all, O  Prophet]. For you, by the grace of your Lord, are not a fortune-teller or a madman.

verses.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ

translations.translation: Or do they say, “[He is] a poet, for whom we [eagerly] await an ill-fate!”?

verses.text: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

translations.translation: Say, “Keep waiting! I too am waiting with you.”

verses.text: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ

translations.translation: Or do their [intelligent] minds prompt them to this [paradox]? Or are they [just] a transgressing people?

verses.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they say, “He made this [Quran] up!”? In fact, they have no faith.

verses.text: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.translation: Let them then produce something like it, if what they say is true!

verses.text: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ

translations.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or are they [their own] creators?

verses.text: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

translations.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they have no certainty.

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord, or are they in control [of everything]?

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: Or do they have a stairway, by which they eavesdrop [on the heavens]? Then let those who do so bring a compelling proof.

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ

translations.translation: Or does He have daughters [as you claim], while you [prefer to] have sons?

verses.text: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ

translations.translation: Or are you [O Prophet] asking them for a reward [for the message] so that they are overburdened by debt?

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they have access to [the Record in] the unseen, so they copy it [for all to see]?

verses.text: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they intend to scheme [against the Prophet]? Then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to [their] schemes.

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glorified is Allah far above what they associate [with Him]!

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ

translations.translation: If they were to see a [deadly] piece of the sky fall down [upon them], still they would say, “[This is just] a pile of clouds.”

verses.text: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ

translations.translation: So leave them until they face their Day in which they will be struck dead—

verses.text: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

translations.translation: the Day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever, nor will they be helped.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: Also, the wrongdoers will certainly have another torment before that [Day], but most of them do not know.

verses.text: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

translations.translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, for you are truly under Our [watchful] Eyes. And glorify the praises of your Lord when you rise.

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ

translations.translation: And glorify Him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ

translations.translation: By the stars when they fade away!

verses.text: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ

translations.translation: Your fellow man is neither misguided nor astray.

verses.text: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Nor does he speak of his own whims.

verses.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْىٌ يُوحَىٰ

translations.translation: It is only a revelation sent down [to him].

verses.text: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلْقُوَىٰ

translations.translation: He has been taught by one [angel] of mighty power

verses.text: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ

translations.translation: and great perfection, who once rose to [his] true form

verses.text: وَهُوَ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

translations.translation: while on the highest point above the horizon,

verses.text: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: then he approached [the Prophet], coming so close

verses.text: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ

translations.translation: that he was only two arms-lengths away or even less.

verses.text: فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ مَآ أَوْحَىٰ

translations.translation: Then Allah revealed to His servant what He revealed [through Gabriel].

verses.text: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ

translations.translation: The [Prophet’s] heart did not doubt what he saw.

verses.text: أَفَتُمَـٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ

translations.translation: How can you [O pagans] then dispute with him regarding what he saw?

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ

translations.translation: And he certainly saw that [angel descend] a second time

verses.text: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ

translations.translation: at the Lote Tree of the most extreme limit [in the seventh heaven]—

verses.text: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰٓ

translations.translation: near which is the Garden of [Eternal] Residence—

verses.text: إِذْ يَغْشَى ٱلسِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ

translations.translation: while the Lote Tree was overwhelmed with [heavenly] splendours!

verses.text: مَا زَاغَ ٱلْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ

translations.translation: The [Prophet’s] sight never wandered, nor did it overreach.

verses.text: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ

translations.translation: He certainly saw some of his Lord’s greatest signs.

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱللَّـٰتَ وَٱلْعُزَّىٰ

translations.translation: Now, have you considered [the idols of] Lât and ’Uzza,

verses.text: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ

translations.translation: and the third one, Manât, as well?

verses.text: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ

translations.translation: Do you [prefer to] have sons while [you attribute] to Him daughters?

verses.text: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Then this is [truly] a biased distribution!

verses.text: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

translations.translation: These [idols] are mere names that you and your forefathers have made up—a practice Allah has never authorized. They follow nothing but [inherited] assumptions and whatever [their] souls desire, although [true] guidance has already come to them from their Lord.

verses.text: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ

translations.translation: Or should every person [simply] have whatever [intercessors] they desire?

verses.text: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.translation: In fact, to Allah [alone] belongs this world and the next.

verses.text: وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ

translations.translation: [Imagine] how many [noble] angels are in the heavens! [Even] their intercession would be of no benefit whatsoever, until Allah gives permission to whoever He wills and [only for the people He] approves.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ

translations.translation: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter label angels as female,

verses.text: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًٔا

translations.translation: although they have no knowledge [in support] of this. They follow nothing but [inherited] assumptions. And surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth.

verses.text: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

translations.translation: So turn away [O Prophet] from whoever has shunned Our Reminder, only seeking the [fleeting] life of this world.

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ

translations.translation: This is the extent of their knowledge. Surely your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is [rightly] guided.

verses.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى

translations.translation: To Allah [alone] belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth so that He may reward the evildoers according to what they did, and reward the good-doers with the finest reward—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ

translations.translation: those who avoid major sins and shameful deeds, despite [stumbling on] minor sins. Surely your Lord is infinite in forgiveness. He knew well what would become of you as He created you from the earth and while you were [still] fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not [falsely] elevate yourselves. He knows best who is [truly] righteous.

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَوَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: Have you seen the one who turned away [from Islam,]

verses.text: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰٓ

translations.translation: and [initially] paid a little [for his salvation], and then stopped?

verses.text: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Does he have the knowledge of the unseen so that he sees [the Hereafter]?

verses.text: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

translations.translation: Or has he not been informed of what is in the Scripture of Moses,

verses.text: وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِى وَفَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: and [that of] Abraham, who [perfectly] fulfilled [his covenant]?

verses.text: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ

translations.translation: [They state] that no soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another,

verses.text: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

translations.translation: and that each person will only have what they endeavoured towards,

verses.text: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُۥ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ

translations.translation: and that [the outcome of] their endeavours will be seen [in their record],

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُجْزَىٰهُ ٱلْجَزَآءَ ٱلْأَوْفَىٰ

translations.translation: then they will be fully rewarded,

verses.text: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ

translations.translation: and that to your Lord [alone] is the ultimate return [of all things].

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ

translations.translation: Moreover, He is the One Who brings about joy and sadness.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا

translations.translation: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰ

translations.translation: And He created the pairs—males and females—

verses.text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ

translations.translation: from a sperm-drop when it is emitted.

verses.text: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ

translations.translation: And it is upon Him to bring about re-creation.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ

translations.translation: And He is the One Who enriches and impoverishes.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعْرَىٰ

translations.translation: And He alone is the Lord of Sirius.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.translation: And He destroyed the first [people of] ’Ȃd,

verses.text: وَثَمُودَا۟ فَمَآ أَبْقَىٰ

translations.translation: and [then] Thamûd, sparing no one.

verses.text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ

translations.translation: And before [that He destroyed] the people of Noah, who were truly far worse in wrongdoing and transgression.

verses.text: وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ

translations.translation: And [it was] He [Who] turned the cities [of Sodom and Gomorrah] upside down.

verses.text: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ

translations.translation: How overwhelming was what covered [them]!

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ

translations.translation: Now, which of your Lord’s favours will you dispute?

verses.text: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلْأُولَىٰٓ

translations.translation: This [Prophet] is a warner like earlier ones.

verses.text: أَزِفَتِ ٱلْـَٔازِفَةُ

translations.translation: The approaching [Hour] has drawn near.

verses.text: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

translations.translation: None but Allah can disclose it.

verses.text: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ

translations.translation: Do you find this revelation astonishing,

verses.text: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ

translations.translation: laughing [at it] and not weeping [in awe],

verses.text: وَأَنتُمْ سَـٰمِدُونَ

translations.translation: while persisting in heedlessness?

verses.text: فَٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ ۩

translations.translation: Instead, prostrate to Allah and worship [Him alone]!

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ

translations.translation: The Hour has drawn near and the moon was split [in two].

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ

translations.translation: Yet, whenever they see a sign, they turn away, saying, “Same old magic!”

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ

translations.translation: They rejected [the truth] and followed their own desires—and every matter will be settled—

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ

translations.translation: even though the stories [of destroyed nations] that have already come to them are a sufficient deterrent.

verses.text: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ

translations.translation: [This Quran is] profound [in] wisdom, but warnings are of no benefit [to them].

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ

translations.translation: So turn away from them [O Prophet]. [And wait for] the Day [when] the caller will summon [them] for something horrifying.

verses.text: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ

translations.translation: With eyes downcast, they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts,

verses.text: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ

translations.translation: rushing towards the caller. The disbelievers will cry, “This is a difficult Day!”

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ

translations.translation: Before them, the people of Noah denied [the truth] and rejected Our servant, calling [him] insane. And he was intimidated.

verses.text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ

translations.translation: So he cried out to his Lord, “I am helpless, so help [me]!”

verses.text: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ

translations.translation: So We opened the gates of the sky with pouring rain,

verses.text: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ

translations.translation: and caused the earth to burst with springs, so the waters met for a fate already set.

verses.text: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ

translations.translation: We carried him on that [Ark made] of planks and nails,

verses.text: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

translations.translation: sailing under Our [watchful] Eyes—a [fair] punishment on behalf of the one [they] denied.

verses.text: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.translation: We certainly left this as a sign. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.translation: Then how [dreadful] were My punishment and warnings!

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.translation: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.translation: ’Ȃd [also] rejected [the truth]. Then how [dreadful] were My punishment and warnings!

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ

translations.translation: Indeed, We sent against them a furious wind, on a day of unrelenting misery,

verses.text: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ

translations.translation: that snatched people up, leaving them like trunks of uprooted palm trees.

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.translation: Then how [dreadful] were My punishment and warnings!

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.translation: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

translations.translation: Thamûd rejected the warnings [as well],

verses.text: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ

translations.translation: arguing, “How can we follow one [average] human being from among us? We would then truly be misguided and insane.

verses.text: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ

translations.translation: Has the revelation been sent down [only] to him out of [all of] us? In fact, he is a boastful liar.”

verses.text: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ

translations.translation: [It was revealed to Ṣâliḥ,] “They will soon know who the boastful liar is.

verses.text: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ

translations.translation: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them [closely], and have patience.

verses.text: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ

translations.translation: And tell them that the [drinking] water must be divided between them [and her], each taking a turn to drink [every other day].”

verses.text: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ

translations.translation: But they roused a companion of theirs, so he dared to kill [her].

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.translation: Then how [dreadful] were My punishment and warnings!

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ

translations.translation: Indeed, We sent against them [only] one [mighty] blast, leaving them like the twigs of fence-builders.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.translation: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

translations.translation: The people of Lot [also] rejected the warnings.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ

translations.translation: We unleashed upon them a storm of stones. As for [the believers of] Lot’s family, We delivered them before dawn

verses.text: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ

translations.translation: as a blessing from Us. This is how We reward whoever gives thanks.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

translations.translation: He had already warned them of Our [crushing] blow but they disputed the warnings.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.translation: And they even demanded his angel-guests from him, so We blinded their eyes. [And they were told,] “Taste then My punishment and warnings!”

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ

translations.translation: And indeed, by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment.

verses.text: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

translations.translation: [Again they were told,] “Taste now My punishment and warnings!”

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.translation: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ

translations.translation: And indeed, the warnings [also] came to the people of Pharaoh.

verses.text: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ

translations.translation: [But] they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the [crushing] grip of the Almighty, Most Powerful.

verses.text: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ

translations.translation: Now, are you [Meccan] disbelievers superior to those [destroyed peoples]? Or have you [been granted] immunity [from punishment] in divine Books?

verses.text: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ

translations.translation: Or do they say, “We are all [a] united [front], bound to prevail.”?

verses.text: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ

translations.translation: [Soon] their united front will be defeated and [forced to] flee.

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

translations.translation: Better yet, the Hour is their appointed time—and the Hour will be most catastrophic and most bitter.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, the wicked are [entrenched] in misguidance, and [are bound for] blazes.

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

translations.translation: On the Day they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, [they will be told,] “Taste the touch of Hell!”

verses.text: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, We have created everything, perfectly preordained.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ

translations.translation: Our command is but a single word, done in the blink of an eye.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ

translations.translation: We have already destroyed the likes of you. So will any [of you] be mindful?

verses.text: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ

translations.translation: Everything they have done is [listed] in [their] records.

verses.text: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ

translations.translation: Every matter, small and large, is written [precisely].

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and rivers,

verses.text: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ

translations.translation: at the Seat of Honour in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ

translations.translation: The Most Compassionate

verses.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ

translations.translation: taught the Quran,

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ

translations.translation: created humanity,

verses.text: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلْبَيَانَ

translations.translation: [and] taught them speech.

verses.text: ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ

translations.translation: The sun and the moon [travel] with precision.

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجْمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ

translations.translation: The stars and the trees bow down [in submission].

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلْمِيزَانَ

translations.translation: As for the sky, He raised it [high], and set the balance [of justice]

verses.text: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْمِيزَانِ

translations.translation: so that you do not defraud the scales.

verses.text: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ

translations.translation: Weigh with justice, and do not give short measure.

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ

translations.translation: He laid out the earth for all beings.

verses.text: فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَٱلنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ ٱلْأَكْمَامِ

translations.translation: In it are fruit, palm trees with date stalks,

verses.text: وَٱلْحَبُّ ذُو ٱلْعَصْفِ وَٱلرَّيْحَانُ

translations.translation: and grain with husks, and aromatic plants.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you [humans and jinn] both deny?

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ كَٱلْفَخَّارِ

translations.translation: He created humankind from [sounding] clay like pottery,

verses.text: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ

translations.translation: and created jinn from a [smokeless] flame of fire.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَغْرِبَيْنِ

translations.translation: [He is] Lord of the two easts and the two wests.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ

translations.translation: He merges the two bodies of [fresh and salt] water,

verses.text: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ

translations.translation: yet between them is a barrier they never cross.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا ٱللُّؤْلُؤُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ

translations.translation: Out of both [waters] come forth pearls and coral.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ

translations.translation: To Him belong the ships with raised sails, sailing through the seas like mountains.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ

translations.translation: Every being on earth is bound to perish.

verses.text: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

translations.translation: Only your Lord Himself, full of Majesty and Honour, will remain [forever].

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ

translations.translation: All those in the heavens and the earth are dependent on Him. Day in and day out He has something to bring about.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ

translations.translation: We will soon attend to you [for judgment], O  two multitudes [of jinn and humans]!

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ

translations.translation: O  assembly of jinn and humans! If you can penetrate beyond the realms of the heavens and the earth, then do so. [But] you cannot do that without [Our] authority.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

translations.translation: Flames of fire and [molten] copper will be sent against you, and you will not be able to defend one another.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ

translations.translation: [How horrible will it be] when the heavens will split apart, becoming rose-red like [burnt] oil!

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ

translations.translation: On that Day there will be no need for any human or jinn to be asked about their sins.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ

translations.translation: The wicked will be recognized by their appearance, then will be seized by [their] forelocks and feet.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “This is the Hell which the wicked denied.”

verses.text: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٍ

translations.translation: They will alternate between its flames and scalding water.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ

translations.translation: And whoever is in awe of standing before their Lord will have two Gardens.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: ذَوَاتَآ أَفْنَانٍ

translations.translation: [Both will be] with lush branches.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ

translations.translation: In each [Garden] will be two flowing springs.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ

translations.translation: In each will be two types of every fruit.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ

translations.translation: Those [believers] will recline on furnishings lined with rich brocade. And the fruit of both Gardens will hang within reach.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ

translations.translation: In both [Gardens] will be maidens of modest gaze, who no human or jinn has ever touched before.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلْيَاقُوتُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ

translations.translation: Those [maidens] will be [as elegant] as rubies and coral.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: هَلْ جَزَآءُ ٱلْإِحْسَـٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلْإِحْسَـٰنُ

translations.translation: Is there any reward for goodness except goodness?

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ

translations.translation: And below these two [Gardens] will be two others.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: مُدْهَآمَّتَانِ

translations.translation: Both will be dark green.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ

translations.translation: In each will be two gushing springs.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فِيهِمَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ

translations.translation: In both will be fruit, palm trees, and pomegranates.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَٰتٌ حِسَانٌ

translations.translation: In all Gardens will be noble, pleasant mates.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: حُورٌ مَّقْصُورَٰتٌ فِى ٱلْخِيَامِ

translations.translation: [They will be] maidens with gorgeous eyes, reserved in pavilions.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ

translations.translation: No human or jinn has ever touched these [maidens] before.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ

translations.translation: All [believers] will be reclining on green cushions and splendid carpets.

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

translations.translation: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

verses.text: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

translations.translation: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, full of Majesty and Honour.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ

translations.translation: When the Inevitable Event takes place,

verses.text: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ

translations.translation: then no one can deny it has come.

verses.text: خَافِضَةٌ رَّافِعَةٌ

translations.translation: It will debase [some] and elevate [others].

verses.text: إِذَا رُجَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ رَجًّا

translations.translation: When the earth will be violently shaken,

verses.text: وَبُسَّتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ بَسًّا

translations.translation: and the mountains will be crushed to pieces,

verses.text: فَكَانَتْ هَبَآءً مُّنۢبَثًّا

translations.translation: becoming scattered [particles of] dust,

verses.text: وَكُنتُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا ثَلَـٰثَةً

translations.translation: you will [all] be [divided into] three groups:

verses.text: فَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ

translations.translation: the people of the right, how [blessed] will they be;

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ

translations.translation: the people of the left, how [miserable] will they be;

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ

translations.translation: and the foremost [in faith] will be the foremost [in Paradise].

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

translations.translation: They are the ones nearest [to Allah],

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translations.translation: in the Gardens of Bliss.

verses.text: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: [They will be] a multitude from earlier generations

verses.text: وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: and a few from later generations.

verses.text: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّوْضُونَةٍ

translations.translation: [All will be] on jewelled thrones,

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَـٰبِلِينَ

translations.translation: reclining face to face.

verses.text: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ

translations.translation: They will be waited on by eternal youths

verses.text: بِأَكْوَابٍ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ

translations.translation: with cups, pitchers, and a drink [of pure wine] from a flowing stream,

verses.text: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ

translations.translation: that will cause them neither headache nor intoxication.

verses.text: وَفَـٰكِهَةٍ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ

translations.translation: [They will also be served] any fruit they choose

verses.text: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

translations.translation: and meat from any bird they desire.

verses.text: وَحُورٌ عِينٌ

translations.translation: And [they will have] maidens with gorgeous eyes,

verses.text: كَأَمْثَـٰلِ ٱللُّؤْلُؤِ ٱلْمَكْنُونِ

translations.translation: like pristine pearls,

verses.text: جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: [all] as a reward for what they used to do.

verses.text: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا

translations.translation: There they will never hear any idle or sinful talk—

verses.text: إِلَّا قِيلًا سَلَـٰمًا سَلَـٰمًا

translations.translation: only good and virtuous speech.

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْيَمِينِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.translation: And the people of the right—how [blessed] will they be!

verses.text: فِى سِدْرٍ مَّخْضُودٍ

translations.translation: [They will be] amid thornless lote trees,

verses.text: وَطَلْحٍ مَّنضُودٍ

translations.translation: clusters of bananas,

verses.text: وَظِلٍّ مَّمْدُودٍ

translations.translation: extended shade,

verses.text: وَمَآءٍ مَّسْكُوبٍ

translations.translation: flowing water,

verses.text: وَفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ

translations.translation: abundant fruit—

verses.text: لَّا مَقْطُوعَةٍ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ

translations.translation: never out of season nor forbidden—

verses.text: وَفُرُشٍ مَّرْفُوعَةٍ

translations.translation: and elevated furnishings.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُنَّ إِنشَآءً

translations.translation: Indeed, We will have perfectly created their mates,

verses.text: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا

translations.translation: making them virgins,

verses.text: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا

translations.translation: loving and of equal age,

verses.text: لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.translation: for the people of the right,

verses.text: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: [who will be] a multitude from earlier generations

verses.text: وَثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: and a multitude from later generations.

verses.text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ مَآ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ

translations.translation: And the people of the left—how [miserable] will they be!

verses.text: فِى سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ

translations.translation: [They will be] in scorching heat and boiling water,

verses.text: وَظِلٍّ مِّن يَحْمُومٍ

translations.translation: in the shade of black smoke,

verses.text: لَّا بَارِدٍ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ

translations.translation: neither cool nor refreshing.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, before this [torment] they were spoiled by luxury,

verses.text: وَكَانُوا۟ يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى ٱلْحِنثِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.translation: and persisted in the worst of sin.

verses.text: وَكَانُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

translations.translation: They used to ask [mockingly], “When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

verses.text: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ

translations.translation: And our forefathers as well?”

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “Most certainly, earlier and later generations

verses.text: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَـٰتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

translations.translation: will surely be gathered [together] for the appointed Day.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.translation: Then you, O  misguided deniers,

verses.text: لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٍ مِّن زَقُّومٍ

translations.translation: will certainly eat from [the fruit of] the trees of Zaqqûm,

verses.text: فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ

translations.translation: filling up [your] bellies with it.

verses.text: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْحَمِيمِ

translations.translation: Then on top of that you will drink boiling water—

verses.text: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ شُرْبَ ٱلْهِيمِ

translations.translation: and you will drink [it] like thirsty camels do.”

verses.text: هَـٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: This will be their accommodation on the Day of Judgment.

verses.text: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ

translations.translation: It is We Who created you. Will you not then believe [in resurrection]?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تُمْنُونَ

translations.translation: Have you considered what you ejaculate?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُۥٓ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ

translations.translation: Is it you who create [a child out of] it, or is it We Who do so?

verses.text: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ

translations.translation: We have ordained death for [all of] you, and We cannot be prevented

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَـٰلَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: from transforming and recreating you in forms unknown to you.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.translation: You already know how you were first created. Will you not then be mindful?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَحْرُثُونَ

translations.translation: Have you considered what you sow?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُۥٓ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلزَّٰرِعُونَ

translations.translation: Is it you who cause it to grow, or is it We Who do so?

verses.text: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ

translations.translation: If We willed, We could simply reduce this [harvest] to chaff, leaving you to lament,

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ

translations.translation: “We have truly suffered a [great] loss.

verses.text: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ

translations.translation: In fact, we have been deprived [of our livelihood].”

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلْمَآءَ ٱلَّذِى تَشْرَبُونَ

translations.translation: Have you considered the water you drink?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ

translations.translation: Is it you who bring it down from the clouds, or is it We Who do so?

verses.text: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ

translations.translation: If We willed, We could make it salty. Will you not then give thanks?

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِى تُورُونَ

translations.translation: Have you considered the fire you kindle?

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنشِـُٔونَ
