translations.translation: He is the One Who smoothed out the earth for you, so move about in its regions and eat from His provisions. And to Him is the resurrection [of all].

verses.text: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ

translations.translation: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you up as it quakes violently?

verses.text: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ

translations.translation: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not unleash upon you a storm of stones. Only then would you know how [serious] My warning was!

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

translations.translation: And certainly those before them denied [as well], then how severe was My response!

verses.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ

translations.translation: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading and folding their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate. Indeed, He is All-Seeing of everything.

verses.text: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ

translations.translation: Also, which [powerless] force will come to your help instead of the Most Compassionate? Indeed, the disbelievers are only [lost] in delusion.

verses.text: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ

translations.translation: Or who is it that will provide for you if He withholds His provision? In fact, they persist in arrogance and aversion [to the truth].

verses.text: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

translations.translation: Who is [rightly] guided: the one who crawls facedown or the one who walks upright on the Straight Path?

verses.text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “He is the One Who brought you into being and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. [Yet] you hardly give any thanks.”

verses.text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ

translations.translation: [Also] say, “He is the One Who has dispersed you [all] over the earth, and to Him you will [all] be gathered.”

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.translation: [Still] they ask [the believers], “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only sent with a clear warning.”

verses.text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ

translations.translation: Then when they see the torment drawing near, the faces of the disbelievers will become gloomy, and it will be said [to them], “This is what you claimed would never come.”

verses.text: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “Consider this: whether Allah causes me and those with me to die or shows us mercy, who will save the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”

verses.text: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.translation: Say, “He is the Most Compassionate—in Him [alone] we believe, and in Him [alone] we trust. You will soon know who is clearly astray.”

verses.text: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ

translations.translation: Say, “Consider this: if your water were to sink [into the earth], then who [else] could bring you flowing water?”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ نٓ ۚ وَٱلْقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسْطُرُونَ

translations.translation: Nũn. By the pen and what everyone writes!

verses.text: مَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجْنُونٍ

translations.translation: By the grace of your Lord, you [O Prophet] are not insane.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجْرًا غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍ

translations.translation: You will certainly have a never-ending reward.

verses.text: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ

translations.translation: And you are truly [a man] of outstanding character.

verses.text: فَسَتُبْصِرُ وَيُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: Soon you and the pagans will see,

verses.text: بِأَييِّكُمُ ٱلْمَفْتُونُ

translations.translation: which of you is mad.

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ

translations.translation: Surely your Lord [alone] knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is [rightly] guided.

verses.text: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: So do not give in to the deniers.

verses.text: وَدُّوا۟ لَوْ تُدْهِنُ فَيُدْهِنُونَ

translations.translation: They wish you would compromise so they would yield [to you].

verses.text: وَلَا تُطِعْ كُلَّ حَلَّافٍ مَّهِينٍ

translations.translation: And do not obey the despicable, vain oath-taker,

verses.text: هَمَّازٍ مَّشَّآءٍۭ بِنَمِيمٍ

translations.translation: slanderer, gossip-monger,

verses.text: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

translations.translation: withholder of good, transgressor, evildoer,

verses.text: عُتُلٍّۭ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ

translations.translation: brute, and—on top of all that—an illegitimate child.

verses.text: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٍ وَبَنِينَ

translations.translation: Now, [simply] because he has been blessed with [abundant] wealth and children,

verses.text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: whenever Our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”

verses.text: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلْخُرْطُومِ

translations.translation: We will soon mark his snout.

verses.text: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَـٰهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا۟ لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, We have tested those [Meccans] as We tested the owners of the garden—when they swore they would surely harvest [all] its fruit in the early morning,

verses.text: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ

translations.translation: leaving no thought for Allah’s Will.

verses.text: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ

translations.translation: Then it was struck by a torment from your Lord while they slept,

verses.text: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ

translations.translation: so it was reduced to ashes.

verses.text: فَتَنَادَوْا۟ مُصْبِحِينَ

translations.translation: Then by daybreak they called out to each other,

verses.text: أَنِ ٱغْدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰرِمِينَ

translations.translation: [saying,] “Go early to your harvest, if you want to pick [all] the fruit.”

verses.text: فَٱنطَلَقُوا۟ وَهُمْ يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ

translations.translation: So they went off, whispering to one another,

verses.text: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌ

translations.translation: “Do not let any poor person enter your garden today.”

verses.text: وَغَدَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍ قَـٰدِرِينَ

translations.translation: And they proceeded early, totally fixated on their purpose.

verses.text: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ

translations.translation: But when they saw it [devastated], they cried, “We must have lost [our] way!

verses.text: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ

translations.translation: In fact, we have been deprived [of our livelihood].”

verses.text: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

translations.translation: The most sensible of them said, “Did I not urge you to say, ‘Allah willing.’?”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

translations.translation: They replied, “Glory be to our Lord! We have truly been wrongdoers.”

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلَـٰوَمُونَ

translations.translation: Then they turned on each other, throwing blame.

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَـٰغِينَ

translations.translation: They said, “Woe to us! We have certainly been transgressors.

verses.text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

translations.translation: We trust our Lord will give us a better garden than this, [for] we are indeed turning to our Lord with hope.”

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: That is the [way of Our] punishment [in this world]. But the punishment of the Hereafter is certainly far worse, if only they knew.

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translations.translation: Indeed, the righteous will have the Gardens of Bliss with their Lord.

verses.text: أَفَنَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ كَٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translations.translation: Should We then treat those who have submitted like the wicked?

verses.text: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ

translations.translation: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

verses.text: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَـٰبٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ

translations.translation: Or do you have a scripture, in which you read

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ

translations.translation: that you will have whatever you choose?

verses.text: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَـٰنٌ عَلَيْنَا بَـٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ

translations.translation: Or do you have oaths binding on Us until the Day of Judgment that you will have whatever you decide?

verses.text: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ

translations.translation: Ask them [O Prophet] which of them can guarantee all that.

verses.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.translation: Or do they have associate-gods [supporting this claim]? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods, if what they say is true.

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ

translations.translation: [Beware of] the Day the Shin [of Allah] will be bared, and the wicked will be asked to prostrate, but they will not be able to do so,

verses.text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَـٰلِمُونَ

translations.translation: with eyes downcast, totally covered with disgrace. For they were [always] called to prostrate [in the world] when they were fully capable [but they chose not to].

verses.text: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: So leave to Me [O Prophet] those who reject this message. We will gradually draw them to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend.

verses.text: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ

translations.translation: I [only] delay their end for a while, but My planning is flawless.

verses.text: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ

translations.translation: Or are you asking them for a reward [for the message] so that they are overburdened by debt?

verses.text: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ

translations.translation: Or do they have access to [the Record in] the unseen, so they copy it [for all to see]?

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ

translations.translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not be like [Jonah,] the Man of the Whale, who cried out [to Allah], in total distress.

verses.text: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ

translations.translation: Had he not been shown grace by his Lord, he would have certainly been cast onto the open [shore], still blameworthy.

verses.text: فَٱجْتَبَـٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.translation: Then his Lord chose him, making him one of the righteous.

verses.text: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌ

translations.translation: The disbelievers would almost cut you down with their eyes when they hear [you recite] the Reminder, and say, “He is certainly a madman.”

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: But it is simply a reminder to the whole world.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱلْحَآقَّةُ

translations.translation: The Inevitable Hour!

verses.text: مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ

translations.translation: What is the Inevitable Hour?

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what the Inevitable Hour is?

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌۢ بِٱلْقَارِعَةِ

translations.translation: [Both] Thamûd and ’Ȃd denied the Striking Disaster.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ

translations.translation: As for Thamûd, they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ

translations.translation: And as for ’Ȃd, they were destroyed by a furious, bitter wind

verses.text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَـٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ

translations.translation: which Allah unleashed on them non-stop for seven nights and eight days, so that you would have seen its people lying dead like trunks of uprooted palm trees.

verses.text: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٍ

translations.translation: Do you see any of them left alive?

verses.text: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَـٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ

translations.translation: Also, Pharaoh and those before him, and [the people of] the overturned cities [of Lot] indulged in sin,

verses.text: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً

translations.translation: each disobeying their Lord’s messenger, so He seized them with a crushing grip.

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَـٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ

translations.translation: Indeed, when the floodwater had overflowed, We carried you in the floating Ark [with Noah],

verses.text: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌ وَٰعِيَةٌ

translations.translation: so that We may make this a reminder to you, and that attentive ears may grasp it.

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ

translations.translation: At last, when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast,

verses.text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَٰحِدَةً

translations.translation: and the earth and mountains will be lifted up and crushed with one blow,

verses.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ

translations.translation: on that Day the Inevitable Event will have come to pass.

verses.text: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِىَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ

translations.translation: The sky will then be so torn that it will be frail,

verses.text: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَـٰنِيَةٌ

translations.translation: with the angels on its sides. On that Day eight [mighty angels] will bear the Throne of your Lord above them.

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ

translations.translation: You will then be presented [before Him for judgment], and none of your secrets will stay hidden.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ

translations.translation: As for those given their records in their right hand, they will cry [happily], “Here [everyone]! Read my record!

verses.text: إِنِّى ظَنَنتُ أَنِّى مُلَـٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ

translations.translation: I surely knew I would face my reckoning.”

verses.text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ

translations.translation: They will be in a life of bliss,

verses.text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ

translations.translation: in an elevated Garden,

verses.text: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ

translations.translation: whose fruit will hang within reach.

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ

translations.translation: And as for those given their record in their left hand, they will cry [bitterly], “I wish I had not been given my record,

verses.text: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ

translations.translation: nor known anything of my reckoning!

verses.text: يَـٰلَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلْقَاضِيَةَ

translations.translation: I wish death was the end!

verses.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّى مَالِيَهْ ۜ

translations.translation: My wealth has not benefited me!

verses.text: هَلَكَ عَنِّى سُلْطَـٰنِيَهْ

translations.translation: My authority has been stripped from me.”

verses.text: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ

translations.translation: [It will be said,] “Seize and shackle them,

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ

translations.translation: then burn them in Hell,

verses.text: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ

translations.translation: then tie them up with chains seventy arms long.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.translation: For they never had faith in Allah, the Greatest,

verses.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

translations.translation: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor.

verses.text: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَـٰهُنَا حَمِيمٌ

translations.translation: So this Day they will have no close friend here,

verses.text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ

translations.translation: nor any food except [oozing] pus,

verses.text: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْخَـٰطِـُٔونَ

translations.translation: which none will eat except the evildoers.”

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: Now, I do swear by whatever you see,

verses.text: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.translation: and whatever you cannot see!

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, this [Quran] is the recitation of a noble Messenger.

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.translation: It is not the prose of a poet [as you claim], [yet] you hardly have any faith.

verses.text: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.translation: Nor is it the mumbling of a fortune-teller, [yet] you are hardly mindful.

verses.text: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.

verses.text: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ ٱلْأَقَاوِيلِ

translations.translation: Had the Messenger made up something in Our Name,

verses.text: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.translation: We would have certainly seized him by his right hand,

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ ٱلْوَتِينَ

translations.translation: then severed his aorta,

verses.text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَـٰجِزِينَ

translations.translation: and none of you could have shielded him [from Us]!

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

translations.translation: Indeed, this [Quran] is a reminder to those mindful [of Allah].

verses.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: And We certainly know that some of you will persist in denial,

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.translation: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers.

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ

translations.translation: And indeed, this [Quran] is the absolute truth.

verses.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.translation: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ سَأَلَ سَآئِلٌۢ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ

translations.translation: A challenger has demanded a punishment bound to come

verses.text: لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٌ

translations.translation: for the disbelievers—to be averted by none—

verses.text: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِى ٱلْمَعَارِجِ

translations.translation: from Allah, Lord of pathways of [heavenly] ascent,

verses.text: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ

translations.translation: [through which] the angels and the [holy] spirit will ascend to Him on a Day fifty thousand years in length.

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا

translations.translation: So endure [this denial, O  Prophet,] with beautiful patience.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُۥ بَعِيدًا

translations.translation: They truly see this [Day] as impossible,

verses.text: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبًا

translations.translation: but We see it as inevitable.

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلْمُهْلِ

translations.translation: On that Day the sky will be like molten brass

verses.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ

translations.translation: and the mountains like [tufts of] wool.

verses.text: وَلَا يَسْـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا

translations.translation: And no close friend will ask [about] their friends,

verses.text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ

translations.translation: [although] they will be made to see each other. The wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that Day by their children,

verses.text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ

translations.translation: their spouses, their siblings,

verses.text: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِى تُـْٔوِيهِ

translations.translation: their clan that sheltered them,

verses.text: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

translations.translation: and everyone on earth altogether, just to save themselves.

verses.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ

translations.translation: But no! There will certainly be a raging Flame

verses.text: نَزَّاعَةً لِّلشَّوَىٰ

translations.translation: ripping off scalps.

verses.text: تَدْعُوا۟ مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: It will summon whoever turned their backs [on Allah] and turned away [from the truth],

verses.text: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ

translations.translation: and gathered and hoarded [wealth].

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا

translations.translation: Indeed, humankind was created impatient:

verses.text: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا

translations.translation: distressed when touched with evil,

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا

translations.translation: and withholding when touched with good—

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ

translations.translation: except those who pray,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَآئِمُونَ

translations.translation: consistently performing their prayers;

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ

translations.translation: and who give the rightful share of their wealth

verses.text: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ

translations.translation: to the beggar and the poor;

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: and who [firmly] believe in the Day of Judgment;

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ

translations.translation: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord—

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ

translations.translation: [knowing that] none should feel secure from their Lord’s punishment—

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ

translations.translation: and those who guard their chastity

verses.text: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ

translations.translation: except with their wives or those [bondwomen] in their possession, for then they are free from blame,

verses.text: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ

translations.translation: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ

translations.translation: [The faithful are] also those who are true to their trusts and covenants;

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَـٰدَٰتِهِمْ قَآئِمُونَ

translations.translation: and who are honest in their testimony;

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ

translations.translation: and who are [properly] observant of their prayers.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ

translations.translation: These will be in Gardens, held in honour.

verses.text: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ

translations.translation: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush [head-long] towards you [O Prophet],

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ

translations.translation: from the right and the left, in groups [to mock you]?

verses.text: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ

translations.translation: Does every one of them expect to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?

verses.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: But no! Indeed, they [already] know what We created them from.

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَـٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَـٰدِرُونَ

translations.translation: So, I do swear by the Lord of [all] the points of sunrise and sunset that We are truly capable

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ

translations.translation: of replacing them with [others] better than them, and We cannot be prevented [from doing so].

verses.text: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

translations.translation: So let them indulge [in falsehood] and amuse [themselves] until they face their Day, which they have been threatened with—

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ

translations.translation: the Day they will come forth from the graves swiftly, as if racing to an idol [for a blessing],

verses.text: خَـٰشِعَةً أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ

translations.translation: with eyes downcast, utterly covered with disgrace. That is the Day they have [always] been warned of.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

translations.translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people [saying to him], “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them.”

verses.text: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.translation: Noah proclaimed, “O my people! I am truly sent to you with a clear warning:

verses.text: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ

translations.translation: worship Allah [alone], fear Him, and obey me.

verses.text: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: He will forgive your sins, and delay your end until the appointed time. Indeed, when the time set by Allah comes, it cannot be delayed, if only you knew!”

verses.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا

translations.translation: He cried, “My Lord! I have surely called my people day and night,

verses.text: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا

translations.translation: but my calls only made them run farther away.

verses.text: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا

translations.translation: And whenever I invite them to be forgiven by You, they press their fingers into their ears, cover themselves with their clothes, persist [in denial], and act very arrogantly.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا

translations.translation: Then I certainly called them openly,

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا

translations.translation: then I surely preached to them publicly and privately,

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا

translations.translation: saying, ‘Seek your Lord’s forgiveness, [for] He is truly Most Forgiving.

verses.text: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا

translations.translation: He will shower you with abundant rain,

verses.text: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا

translations.translation: supply you with wealth and children, and give you gardens as well as rivers.

verses.text: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا

translations.translation: What is the matter with you that you are not in awe of the Majesty of Allah,

verses.text: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا

translations.translation: when He truly created you in stages [of development]?

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا

translations.translation: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens, one above the other,

verses.text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا

translations.translation: placing the moon within them as a [reflected] light, and the sun as a [radiant] lamp?

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا

translations.translation: Allah [alone] caused you to grow from the earth like a plant.

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا

translations.translation: Then He will return you to it, and then simply bring you forth [again].

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا

translations.translation: And Allah [alone] spread out the earth for you

verses.text: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا

translations.translation: to walk along its spacious pathways.’”

verses.text: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

translations.translation: [Eventually,] Noah cried, “My Lord! They have certainly persisted in disobeying me, and followed [instead] those [elite] whose [abundant] wealth and children only increase them in loss,

verses.text: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا

translations.translation: and who have devised a tremendous plot,

verses.text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا

translations.translation: urging [their followers], ‘Do not abandon your idols—especially Wadd, Suwâ’, Yaghûth, Ya’ûq, and Nasr.’

verses.text: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا

translations.translation: Those [elite] have already led many astray. So [O Lord], only allow the wrongdoers to stray farther away.”

verses.text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا

translations.translation: So because of their sins, they were drowned, then admitted into the Fire. And they found none to help them against Allah.

verses.text: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

translations.translation: Noah had prayed, “My Lord! Do not leave a single disbeliever on earth.

verses.text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا

translations.translation: For if You spare [any of] them, they will certainly mislead Your servants, and give birth only to [wicked] sinners, staunch disbelievers.

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا

translations.translation: My Lord! Forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house in faith, and [all] believing men and women. And increase the wrongdoers only in destruction.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened [to the Quran,] and said [to their fellow jinn]: ‘Indeed, we have heard a wondrous recitation.

verses.text: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا

translations.translation: It leads to Right Guidance so we believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord [in worship].

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا

translations.translation: [Now, we believe that] our Lord—Exalted is His Majesty—has neither taken a mate nor offspring,

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا

translations.translation: and that the foolish of us used to utter [outrageous] falsehoods about Allah.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا

translations.translation: We certainly thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا

translations.translation: And some men used to seek refuge with some jinn—so they increased each other in wickedness.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا

translations.translation: And those [humans] thought, just like you [jinn], that Allah would not resurrect anyone [for judgment].

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا

translations.translation: [Earlier] we tried to reach heaven [for news], only to find it filled with stern guards and shooting stars.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا

translations.translation: We used to take up positions there for eavesdropping, but whoever dares eavesdrop now will find a flare lying in wait for them.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا

translations.translation: Now, we have no clue whether evil is intended for those on earth, or their Lord intends for them what is right.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا

translations.translation: Among us are those who are righteous and those who are less so. We have been of different factions.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا

translations.translation: [Now,] we truly know that we cannot frustrate Allah on earth, nor can we escape from Him [into heaven].

verses.text: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا

translations.translation: When we heard the guidance [of the Quran], we [readily] believed in it. For whoever believes in their Lord will have no fear of being denied [a reward] or wronged.

verses.text: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا

translations.translation: And among us are those who have submitted [to Allah] and those who are deviant. So [as for] those who submitted, it is they who have attained Right Guidance.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا

translations.translation: And as for the deviant, they will be fuel for Hell.’”

verses.text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا

translations.translation: Had the deniers followed the Right Way, We would have certainly granted them abundant rain to drink—

verses.text: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا

translations.translation: as a test for them. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of their Lord will be admitted by Him into an overwhelming punishment.

verses.text: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا

translations.translation: The places of worship are [only] for Allah, so do not invoke anyone besides Him.

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا

translations.translation: Yet when the servant of Allah stood up calling upon Him [alone], the pagans almost swarmed over him.

verses.text: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “I call only upon my Lord, associating none with Him [in worship].”

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا

translations.translation: Say, “It is not in my power to harm or benefit you.”

verses.text: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا

translations.translation: Say, “No one can protect me from Allah [if I were to disobey Him], nor can I find any refuge other than Him.

verses.text: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا

translations.translation: [My duty is] only to convey [the truth] from Allah and [deliver] His messages.” And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger will certainly be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there for ever and ever.

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا

translations.translation: Only when they see what they have been threatened with will they know who is weaker in helpers and inferior in manpower.

verses.text: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا

translations.translation: Say, “I do not know if what you are promised is near or my Lord has set a distant time for it.

verses.text: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

translations.translation: [He is the] Knower of the unseen, disclosing none of it to anyone,

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا

translations.translation: except messengers of His choice. Then He appoints angel-guards before and behind them

verses.text: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا

translations.translation: to ensure that the messengers fully deliver the messages of their Lord—though He [already] knows all about them, and keeps account of everything.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ

translations.translation: O you wrapped [in your clothes]!

verses.text: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

translations.translation: Stand all night [in prayer] except a little—

verses.text: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا

translations.translation: [pray] half the night, or a little less,

verses.text: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا

translations.translation: or a little more—and recite the Quran [properly] in a measured way.

verses.text: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا

translations.translation: [For] We will soon send upon you a weighty revelation.

verses.text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا

translations.translation: Indeed, worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation.

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا

translations.translation: For during the day you are over-occupied [with worldly duties].

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا

translations.translation: [Always] remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا

translations.translation: [He is the] Lord of the east and the west. There is no god [worthy of worship] except Him, so take Him [alone] as a Trustee of Affairs.

verses.text: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا

translations.translation: Be patient [O Prophet] with what they say, and depart from them courteously.

verses.text: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا

translations.translation: And leave to Me the deniers—the people of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.

verses.text: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا

translations.translation: [For] We certainly have shackles, a [raging] Fire,

verses.text: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

translations.translation: choking food, and a painful punishment [in store for them]

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا

translations.translation: on the Day the earth and mountains will shake [violently], and mountains will be [reduced to] dunes of shifting sand.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا

translations.translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.

verses.text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا

translations.translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a stern grip.

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا

translations.translation: If you [pagans] persist in disbelief, then how will you guard yourselves against [the horrors of] a Day which will turn children’s hair grey?

verses.text: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا

translations.translation: It will [even] cause the sky to split apart. His promise [of judgment] must be fulfilled.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

translations.translation: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the [Right] Way to their Lord.

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ

translations.translation: Surely your Lord knows that you [O Prophet] stand [in prayer] for nearly two-thirds of the night, or [sometimes] half of it, or a third, as do some of those with you. Allah [alone] keeps a [precise] measure of the day and night. He knows that you [believers] are unable to endure this, and has turned to you in mercy. So recite [in prayer] whatever you can from the Quran. He knows that some of you will be sick, some will be travelling throughout the land seeking Allah’s bounty, and some fighting in the cause of Allah. So recite whatever you can from it. And [continue to] perform [regular] prayers, pay alms-tax, and lend to Allah a good loan. Whatever good you send forth for yourselves, you will find it with Allah far better and more rewarding. And seek Allah’s forgiveness. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ

translations.translation: O you covered up [in your clothes]!

verses.text: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ

translations.translation: Arise and warn [all].

verses.text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ

translations.translation: Revere your Lord [alone].

verses.text: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ

translations.translation: Purify your garments.

verses.text: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ

translations.translation: [Continue to] shun idols.

verses.text: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ

translations.translation: Do not do a favour expecting more [in return].

verses.text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ

translations.translation: And persevere for [the sake of] your Lord.

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ

translations.translation: [For] when the Trumpet will be sounded,

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ

translations.translation: that will [truly] be a difficult Day—

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ

translations.translation: far from easy for the disbelievers.

verses.text: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا

translations.translation: And leave to me [O Prophet] the one I created all by Myself,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا

translations.translation: and granted him abundant wealth,

verses.text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا

translations.translation: and children always by his side,

verses.text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًا

translations.translation: and made life very easy for him.

verses.text: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ

translations.translation: Yet he is hungry for more.

verses.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا عَنِيدًا

translations.translation: But no! [For] he has been truly stubborn with Our revelations.

verses.text: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا

translations.translation: I will make his fate unbearable,

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ

translations.translation: for he contemplated and determined [a degrading label for the Quran].

verses.text: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

translations.translation: May he be condemned! How evil was what he determined!

verses.text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

translations.translation: May he be condemned even more! How evil was what he determined!

verses.text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ

translations.translation: Then he re-contemplated [in frustration],

verses.text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ

translations.translation: then frowned and scowled,

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ

translations.translation: then turned his back [on the truth] and acted arrogantly,

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ

translations.translation: saying, “This [Quran] is nothing but magic from the ancients.

verses.text: إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ

translations.translation: This is no more than the word of a man.”

verses.text: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ

translations.translation: Soon I will burn him in Hell!

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what Hell is?

verses.text: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ

translations.translation: It does not let anyone live or die,

verses.text: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ

translations.translation: scorching the skin.

verses.text: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ

translations.translation: It is overseen by nineteen [keepers].

verses.text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ

translations.translation: We have appointed only [stern] angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers, so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those [hypocrites] with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this [description of Hell] is only a reminder to humanity.

verses.text: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ

translations.translation: But no! By the moon,

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ

translations.translation: and the night as it retreats,

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ

translations.translation: and the day as it breaks!

verses.text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ

translations.translation: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—

verses.text: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ

translations.translation: a warning to humankind,

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ

translations.translation: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind.

verses.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ

translations.translation: Every soul will be detained for what it has done,

verses.text: إِلَّآ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.translation: except the people of the right,

verses.text: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.translation: who will be in Gardens, asking one another

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translations.translation: about the wicked [who will then be asked]:

verses.text: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ

translations.translation: “What has landed you in Hell?”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ

translations.translation: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed,

verses.text: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ

translations.translation: nor did we feed the poor.

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ

translations.translation: We used to indulge [in falsehood] along with others,

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: and deny the Day of Judgment,

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ

translations.translation: until the inevitable came to us.”

verses.text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَـٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِينَ

translations.translation: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them.

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ

translations.translation: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder,

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ

translations.translation: as if they were spooked zebras

verses.text: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ

translations.translation: fleeing from a lion?

verses.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً

translations.translation: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a [personal] letter [from Allah] for all [to read].

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ

translations.translation: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌ

translations.translation: Enough! Surely this [Quran] is a reminder.

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

verses.text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ

translations.translation: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He [alone] is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ

translations.translation: I do swear by the Day of Judgment!

verses.text: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ

translations.translation: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul!

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ

translations.translation: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones?

verses.text: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ

translations.translation: Yes [indeed]! We are [most] capable of restoring [even] their very fingertips.

verses.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ

translations.translation: Still people want to deny what is yet to come,

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ

translations.translation: asking [mockingly], “When is this Day of Judgment?”

verses.text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ

translations.translation: But when the sight is stunned,

verses.text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ

translations.translation: and the moon is dimmed,

verses.text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ

translations.translation: and the sun and the moon are brought together,

verses.text: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ

translations.translation: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ

translations.translation: But no! There will be no refuge.

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ

translations.translation: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.

verses.text: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

translations.translation: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind.

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌ

translations.translation: In fact, people will testify against their own souls,

verses.text: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ

translations.translation: despite the excuses they come up with.

verses.text: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

translations.translation: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize [a revelation of] the Quran.

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ

translations.translation: It is certainly upon Us to [make you] memorize and recite it.

verses.text: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَـٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ

translations.translation: So once We have recited a revelation [through Gabriel], follow its recitation [closely].

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ

translations.translation: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear [to you].

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ

translations.translation: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world,

verses.text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ

translations.translation: and neglect the Hereafter.

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ

translations.translation: On that Day [some] faces will be bright,

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ

translations.translation: looking at their Lord.

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌ

translations.translation: And [other] faces will be gloomy,

verses.text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ

translations.translation: anticipating something devastating to befall them.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ

translations.translation: But no! [Beware of the day] when the soul reaches the collar bone [as it leaves],

verses.text: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ

translations.translation: and it will be said, “Is there any healer [who can save this life]?”

verses.text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ

translations.translation: And the dying person realizes it is [their] time to depart,

verses.text: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ

translations.translation: and [then] their feet are tied together [in a shroud].

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ

translations.translation: On that day they will be driven to your Lord [alone].

verses.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: This denier neither believed nor prayed,

verses.text: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: but persisted in denial and turned away,

verses.text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: then went to their own people, walking boastfully.

verses.text: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

translations.translation: Woe to you, and more woe!

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Again, woe to you, and even more woe!

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى

translations.translation: Do people think they will be left without purpose?

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ

translations.translation: Were they not [once] a sperm-drop emitted?

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

translations.translation: Then they became a clinging clot, then He developed and perfected their form,

verses.text: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ

translations.translation: producing from it both sexes, male and female.

verses.text: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ

translations.translation: Is such [a Creator] unable to bring the dead back to life?

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا

translations.translation: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning?

verses.text: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا

translations.translation: [For] indeed, We [alone] created humans from a drop of mixed fluids, [in order] to test them, so We made them hear and see.

verses.text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

translations.translation: We already showed them the Way, whether they [choose to] be grateful or ungrateful.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا

translations.translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

translations.translation: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink [of pure wine]—flavoured with camphor—

verses.text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا

translations.translation: [from] a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will.

verses.text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا

translations.translation: They [are those who] fulfil [their] vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror,

verses.text: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا

translations.translation: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive,

verses.text: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا

translations.translation: [saying to themselves,] “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.

verses.text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا

translations.translation: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”

verses.text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا

translations.translation: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy,

verses.text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا

translations.translation: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden [in Paradise] and [garments of] silk.

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا

translations.translation: There they will be reclining on [canopied] couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold.

verses.text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

translations.translation: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach.

verses.text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠

translations.translation: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—

verses.text: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا

translations.translation: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired.

verses.text: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

translations.translation: And they will be given a drink [of pure wine] flavoured with ginger

verses.text: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا

translations.translation: from a spring there, called Salsabîl.

verses.text: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا

translations.translation: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا

translations.translation: And if you looked around, you would see [indescribable] bliss and a vast kingdom.

verses.text: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا

translations.translation: The virtuous will be [dressed] in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا

translations.translation: [And they will be told,] “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا

translations.translation: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you [O Prophet] in stages.

verses.text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا

translations.translation: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or [staunch] disbeliever from among them.

verses.text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا

translations.translation: [Always] remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening,

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا

translations.translation: and prostrate before Him during part of the night, and glorify Him long at night.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا

translations.translation: Surely those [pagans] love this fleeting world, [totally] neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them.

verses.text: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا

translations.translation: It is We Who created them and perfected their [physical] form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

translations.translation: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the [Right] Way to their Lord.

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا

translations.translation: But you cannot will [to do so] unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

verses.text: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا

translations.translation: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ عُرْفًا

translations.translation: By those [winds] sent forth successively,

verses.text: فَٱلْعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصْفًا

translations.translation: and those blowing violently,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًا

translations.translation: and those scattering [rainclouds] widely!

verses.text: فَٱلْفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ فَرْقًا

translations.translation: And [by] those [angels] fully distinguishing [truth from falsehood],

verses.text: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَـٰتِ ذِكْرًا

translations.translation: and those delivering revelation,

verses.text: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا

translations.translation: ending excuses and giving warnings.

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌ

translations.translation: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass.

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ

translations.translation: So when the stars are put out,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ

translations.translation: and the sky is torn apart,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ

translations.translation: and the mountains are blown away,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ

translations.translation: and the messengers’ time [to testify] comes up—

verses.text: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ

translations.translation: for which Day has all this been set?

verses.text: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ

translations.translation: For the Day of [Final] Decision!

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is?

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers?

verses.text: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.translation: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them.

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translations.translation: This is how We deal with the wicked.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ

translations.translation: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,

verses.text: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ

translations.translation: placing it in a secure place

verses.text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ

translations.translation: until an appointed time?

verses.text: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَـٰدِرُونَ

translations.translation: We [perfectly] ordained [its development]. How excellent are We in doing so!

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا

translations.translation: Have We not made the earth a lodging

verses.text: أَحْيَآءً وَأَمْوَٰتًا

translations.translation: for the living and the dead,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءً فُرَاتًا

translations.translation: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.translation: [The disbelievers will be told,] “Proceed into that [Fire] which you used to deny!

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍ

translations.translation: Proceed into the shade [of smoke] which rises in three columns,

verses.text: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

translations.translation: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames.

verses.text: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍ كَٱلْقَصْرِ

translations.translation: Indeed, it hurls sparks [as big] as huge castles,

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَـٰلَتٌ صُفْرٌ

translations.translation: and [as dark] as black camels.”

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

translations.translation: On that Day they will not [be in a position to] speak,

verses.text: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ

translations.translation: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَـٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: [They will be told by Allah,] “This is the Day of [Final] Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers [for punishment].

verses.text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ

translations.translation: So if you have a scheme [to save yourselves], then use it against Me.”

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ وَعُيُونٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be amid [cool] shade and springs

verses.text: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

translations.translation: and any fruit they desire.

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.translation: [They will be told,] “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.translation: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: [But] woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ

translations.translation: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, [for] you are truly wicked.”

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

translations.translation: When it is said to them, “Bow down [before Allah,” they do not bow.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

verses.text: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.translation: So what message after this [Quran] would they believe in?

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.translation: What are they asking one another about?

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

translations.translation: About the momentous news,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ

translations.translation: over which they disagree.

verses.text: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: But no! They will come to know.

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: Again, no! They will come to know.

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَـٰدًا

translations.translation: Have We not smoothed out the earth [like a bed],

verses.text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا

translations.translation: and [made] the mountains as [its] pegs,

verses.text: وَخَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا

translations.translation: and created you in pairs,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا

translations.translation: and made your sleep for rest,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا

translations.translation: and made the night as a cover,

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا

translations.translation: and made the day for livelihood,

verses.text: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا

translations.translation: and built above you seven mighty [heavens],

verses.text: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا

translations.translation: and placed [in them] a shining lamp,

verses.text: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءً ثَجَّاجًا

translations.translation: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water,

verses.text: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا

translations.translation: producing by it grain and [various] plants,

verses.text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا

translations.translation: and dense orchards?

verses.text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَـٰتًا

translations.translation: Indeed, the Day of [Final] Decision is an appointed time—

verses.text: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا

translations.translation: [it is] the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will [all] come forth in crowds.

verses.text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًا

translations.translation: The sky will be [split] open, becoming [many] gates,

verses.text: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا

translations.translation: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming [like] a mirage.

verses.text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا

translations.translation: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush

verses.text: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًا

translations.translation: as a home for the transgressors,

verses.text: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًا

translations.translation: where they will remain for [endless] ages.

verses.text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا

translations.translation: There they will not taste any coolness or drink,

verses.text: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا

translations.translation: except boiling water and [oozing] pus—

verses.text: جَزَآءً وِفَاقًا

translations.translation: a fitting reward.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا

translations.translation: For they never expected any reckoning,

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كِذَّابًا

translations.translation: and totally rejected Our signs.

verses.text: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ كِتَـٰبًا

translations.translation: And We have everything recorded precisely.

verses.text: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا

translations.translation: [So the deniers will be told,] “Taste [the punishment], for all you will get from Us is more torment.”

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا

translations.translation: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—

verses.text: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَـٰبًا

translations.translation: Gardens, vineyards,

verses.text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا

translations.translation: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age,

verses.text: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا

translations.translation: and full cups [of pure wine],

verses.text: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا

translations.translation: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—

verses.text: جَزَآءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًا

translations.translation: a [fitting] reward as a generous gift from your Lord,

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا

translations.translation: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا

translations.translation: on the Day the [holy] spirit and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true.

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

translations.translation: That Day is the [ultimate] truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord.

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا

translations.translation: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see [the consequences of] what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرْقًا

translations.translation: By those [angels] stripping out [evil souls] harshly,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشْطًا

translations.translation: and those pulling out [good souls] gently,

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَـٰتِ سَبْحًا

translations.translation: and those gliding [through heavens] swiftly,

verses.text: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَـٰتِ سَبْقًا

translations.translation: and those taking the lead vigorously,

verses.text: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًا

translations.translation: and those conducting affairs [obediently]!

verses.text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ

translations.translation: [Consider] the Day [when] the quaking Blast will come to pass,

verses.text: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ

translations.translation: followed by a second Blast.

verses.text: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ

translations.translation: [The deniers’] hearts on that Day will be trembling [in horror],

verses.text: أَبْصَـٰرُهَا خَـٰشِعَةٌ

translations.translation: with their eyes downcast.

verses.text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ

translations.translation: [But now] they ask [mockingly], “Will we really be restored to our former state,

verses.text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمًا نَّخِرَةً

translations.translation: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ

translations.translation: Adding, “Then such a return would be a [total] loss [for us]!”

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ

translations.translation: But indeed, it will take only one [mighty] Blast,

verses.text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ

translations.translation: and at once they will be above ground.

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Has the story of Moses reached you [O Prophet]?

verses.text: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

translations.translation: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa,

verses.text: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ

translations.translation: [commanding,] “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed [all bounds].

verses.text: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

translations.translation: And say, ‘Would you [be willing to] purify yourself,

verses.text: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ

translations.translation: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe [of Him]?’”

verses.text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْـَٔايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

translations.translation: Then Moses showed him the great sign,

verses.text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ

translations.translation: but he denied and disobeyed [Allah],

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ

translations.translation: then turned his back, striving [against the truth].

verses.text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ

translations.translation: Then he summoned [his people] and called out,

verses.text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

translations.translation: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”

verses.text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ

translations.translation: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next.

verses.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of [Allah].

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا

translations.translation: Which is harder to create: you or the sky? He built it,

verses.text: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا

translations.translation: raising it high and forming it flawlessly.

verses.text: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا

translations.translation: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight.

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ

translations.translation: As for the earth, He spread it out as well,

verses.text: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا

translations.translation: bringing forth its water and pastures

verses.text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا

translations.translation: and setting the mountains firmly [upon it]—

verses.text: مَتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ

translations.translation: all as [a means of] sustenance for you and your animals.

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

translations.translation: But, when the Supreme Disaster comes to pass—

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ

translations.translation: the Day every person will remember all [their] striving,

verses.text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ

translations.translation: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ

translations.translation: then as for those who transgressed

verses.text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

translations.translation: and preferred the [fleeting] life of this world,

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ

translations.translation: the Hellfire will certainly be [their] home.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
