translations.translation: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from [evil] desires,

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ

translations.translation: Paradise will certainly be [their] home.

verses.text: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا

translations.translation: They ask you [O Prophet] regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”

verses.text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ

translations.translation: But it is not for you to tell its time.

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ

translations.translation: That knowledge rests with your Lord [alone].

verses.text: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا

translations.translation: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it.

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا

translations.translation: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed [in the world] no more than one evening or its morning.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: He frowned and turned [his attention] away,

verses.text: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ

translations.translation: [simply] because the blind man came to him [interrupting].

verses.text: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: You never know [O Prophet], perhaps he may be purified,

verses.text: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ

translations.translation: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder.

verses.text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ

translations.translation: As for the one who was indifferent,

verses.text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ

translations.translation: you gave him your [undivided] attention,

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ

translations.translation: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ

translations.translation: But as for the one who came to you, eager [to learn],

verses.text: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ

translations.translation: being in awe [of Allah],

verses.text: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ

translations.translation: you were inattentive to him.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ

translations.translation: But no! This [revelation] is truly a reminder.

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

verses.text: فِى صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ

translations.translation: It is [written] on pages held in honour—

verses.text: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ

translations.translation: highly esteemed, purified—

verses.text: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍ

translations.translation: by the hands of angel-scribes,

verses.text: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍ

translations.translation: honourable and virtuous.

verses.text: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: Condemned are [disbelieving] humans! How ungrateful they are [to Allah]!

verses.text: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ

translations.translation: From what substance did He create them?

verses.text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ

translations.translation: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development.

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ

translations.translation: Then He makes the way easy for them,

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: then causes them to die and be buried.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them.

verses.text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered.

verses.text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ

translations.translation: Let people then consider their food:

verses.text: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّا

translations.translation: how We pour down rain in abundance

verses.text: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّا

translations.translation: and meticulously split the earth open [for sprouts],

verses.text: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا

translations.translation: causing grain to grow in it,

verses.text: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا

translations.translation: as well as grapes and greens,

verses.text: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا

translations.translation: and olives and palm trees,

verses.text: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًا

translations.translation: and dense orchards,

verses.text: وَفَـٰكِهَةً وَأَبًّا

translations.translation: and fruit and fodder—

verses.text: مَّتَـٰعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَـٰمِكُمْ

translations.translation: all as [a means of] sustenance for you and your animals.

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ

translations.translation: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass—

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ

translations.translation: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings,

verses.text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ

translations.translation: and [even] their mother and father,

verses.text: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ

translations.translation: and [even] their spouse and children.

verses.text: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ

translations.translation: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own.

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ

translations.translation: On that Day [some] faces will be bright,

verses.text: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ

translations.translation: laughing and rejoicing,

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ

translations.translation: while [other] faces will be dusty,

verses.text: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ

translations.translation: cast in gloom—

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ

translations.translation: those are the disbelievers, the [wicked] sinners.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ

translations.translation: When the sun is put out,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the stars fall down,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the mountains are blown away,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ

translations.translation: and when pregnant camels are left untended,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ

translations.translation: and when wild beasts are gathered together,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the seas are set on fire,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ

translations.translation: and when the souls [and their bodies] are paired [once more],

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ

translations.translation: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked

verses.text: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍ قُتِلَتْ

translations.translation: for what crime they were put to death,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the records [of deeds] are laid open,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ

translations.translation: and when the sky is stripped away,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ

translations.translation: and when Paradise is brought near—

verses.text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ

translations.translation: [on that Day] each soul will know what [deeds] it has brought along.

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ

translations.translation: I do swear by the receding stars

verses.text: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ

translations.translation: which travel and hide,

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ

translations.translation: and the night as it falls

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ

translations.translation: and the day as it breaks!

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, this [Quran] is the Word of [Allah delivered by Gabriel,] a noble messenger-angel,

verses.text: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ

translations.translation: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne,

verses.text: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ

translations.translation: obeyed there [in heaven], and trustworthy.

verses.text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ

translations.translation: And your fellow man is not insane.

verses.text: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ

translations.translation: And he did see that [angel] on the clear horizon,

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ

translations.translation: and he does not withhold [what is revealed to him of] the unseen.

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ

translations.translation: And this [Quran] is not the word of an outcast devil.

verses.text: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ

translations.translation: So what [other] path would you take?

verses.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: Surely this [Quran] is only a reminder to the whole world—

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ

translations.translation: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way.

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: But you cannot will [to do so], except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ

translations.translation: When the sky splits open,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the stars fall away,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the seas burst forth,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ

translations.translation: and when the graves spill out,

verses.text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ

translations.translation: [then] each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

translations.translation: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ

translations.translation: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design,

verses.text: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

translations.translation: moulding you in whatever form He willed?

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: But no! In fact, you deny the [final] Judgment,

verses.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَـٰفِظِينَ

translations.translation: while you are certainly observed by vigilant,

verses.text: كِرَامًا كَـٰتِبِينَ

translations.translation: honourable angels, recording [everything].

verses.text: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ

translations.translation: They know whatever you do.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss,

verses.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍ

translations.translation: and the wicked will be in Hell,

verses.text: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: burning in it on Judgment Day,

verses.text: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ

translations.translation: and they will have no escape from it.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

verses.text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

verses.text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ

translations.translation: [It is] the Day no soul will be of [any] benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah [entirely].

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ

translations.translation: Woe to the defrauders!

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ

translations.translation: Those who take full measure [when they buy] from people,

verses.text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ

translations.translation: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers.

verses.text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ

translations.translation: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected

verses.text: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

translations.translation: for a tremendous Day—

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.translation: the Day [all] people will stand before the Lord of all worlds?

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ

translations.translation: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn [in the depths of Hell]—

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ

translations.translation: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?—

verses.text: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ

translations.translation: a fate [already] sealed.

verses.text: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.translation: Woe on that Day to the deniers—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: those who deny Judgment Day!

verses.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

translations.translation: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor.

verses.text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.translation: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

translations.translation: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all [the evil] they used to commit!

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ

translations.translation: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day.

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.translation: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell,

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.translation: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.”

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ

translations.translation: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn [in elevated Gardens]—

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ

translations.translation: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—

verses.text: كِتَـٰبٌ مَّرْقُومٌ

translations.translation: a fate [already] sealed,

verses.text: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

translations.translation: witnessed by those nearest [to Allah].

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ

translations.translation: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss,

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

translations.translation: [seated] on [canopied] couches, gazing around.

verses.text: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translations.translation: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight.

verses.text: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ

translations.translation: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine,

verses.text: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ

translations.translation: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive [diligently].

verses.text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ

translations.translation: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm—

verses.text: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

translations.translation: a spring from which those nearest [to Allah] will drink.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ

translations.translation: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers,

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ

translations.translation: wink to one another whenever they passed by,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ

translations.translation: and muse [over these exploits] upon returning to their own people.

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

translations.translation: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These [people] are truly astray,”

verses.text: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ

translations.translation: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers.

verses.text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ

translations.translation: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

translations.translation: as they sit on [canopied] couches, looking on.

verses.text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ

translations.translation: [The believers will be asked,] “Have the disbelievers [not] been paid back for what they used to do?”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ

translations.translation: When the sky bursts open,

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

translations.translation: obeying its Lord as it must,

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ

translations.translation: and when the earth is flattened out,

verses.text: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ

translations.translation: and ejects [all] its contents and becomes empty,

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

translations.translation: obeying its Lord as it must, [surely you will all be judged].

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ

translations.translation: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will [eventually] meet the consequences.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ

translations.translation: As for those who are given their record in their right hand,

verses.text: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا

translations.translation: they will have an easy reckoning,

verses.text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا

translations.translation: and will return to their people joyfully.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ

translations.translation: And as for those who are given their record [in their left hand] from behind their backs,

verses.text: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا

translations.translation: they will cry for [instant] destruction,

verses.text: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا

translations.translation: and will burn in the blazing Fire.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا

translations.translation: For they used to be prideful among their people,

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ

translations.translation: thinking they would never return [to Allah].

verses.text: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا

translations.translation: Yes [they would]! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them.

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ

translations.translation: So, I do swear by the twilight!

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ

translations.translation: And by the night and whatever it envelops!

verses.text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ

translations.translation: And by the moon when it waxes full!

verses.text: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ

translations.translation: You will certainly pass from one state to another.

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.translation: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe,

verses.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩

translations.translation: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down [in submission]?

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.translation: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial.

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ

translations.translation: But Allah knows best whatever they hide.

verses.text: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

translations.translation: So give them good news of a painful punishment.

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ

translations.translation: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ

translations.translation: By the sky full of constellations,

verses.text: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ

translations.translation: and the promised Day [of Judgment],

verses.text: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ

translations.translation: and the witness and what is witnessed!

verses.text: قُتِلَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ

translations.translation: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—

verses.text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ

translations.translation: the fire [pit], filled with fuel—

verses.text: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ

translations.translation: when they sat around it,

verses.text: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ

translations.translation: watching what they had [ordered to be] done to the believers,

verses.text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ

translations.translation: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ

translations.translation: [the One] to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ

translations.translation: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

translations.translation: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph.

verses.text: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

translations.translation: Indeed, the [crushing] grip of your Lord is severe.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

translations.translation: [For] He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects [all].

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ

translations.translation: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—

verses.text: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ

translations.translation: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious,

verses.text: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

translations.translation: Doer of whatever He wills.

verses.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ

translations.translation: Has the story of the [destroyed] forces reached you [O Prophet]—

verses.text: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ

translations.translation: [the forces of] Pharaoh and Thamûd?

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍ

translations.translation: Yet the disbelievers [still] persist in denial.

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ

translations.translation: But Allah encompasses them from all sides.

verses.text: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌ مَّجِيدٌ

translations.translation: In fact, this is a glorious Quran,

verses.text: فِى لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ

translations.translation: [recorded] in a Preserved Tablet.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ

translations.translation: By the heaven and the nightly star!

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is?

verses.text: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ

translations.translation: [It is] the star of piercing brightness.

verses.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ

translations.translation: There is no soul without a vigilant angel [recording everything].

verses.text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

translations.translation: Let people then consider what they were created from!

verses.text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍ دَافِقٍ

translations.translation: [They were] created from a spurting fluid,

verses.text: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ

translations.translation: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage.

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌ

translations.translation: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back [to life]

verses.text: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ

translations.translation: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed.

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ

translations.translation: Then one will have neither power nor [any] helper.

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ

translations.translation: By the sky with its recurring cycles,

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ

translations.translation: and the earth with its sprouting plants!

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ

translations.translation: Surely this [Quran] is a decisive word,

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ

translations.translation: and is not to be taken lightly.

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا

translations.translation: They are certainly devising [evil] plans,

verses.text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا

translations.translation: but I too am planning.

verses.text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا

translations.translation: So bear with the disbelievers [O Prophet]. Let them be for [just] a little while.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى

translations.translation: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

translations.translation: Who created and [perfectly] fashioned [all],

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

translations.translation: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly,

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ

translations.translation: and Who brings forth [green] pasture,

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ

translations.translation: then reduces it to withered chaff.

verses.text: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ

translations.translation: We will have you recite [the Quran, O  Prophet,] so you will not forget [any of it],

verses.text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ

translations.translation: unless Allah wills otherwise. He surely knows what is open and what is hidden.

verses.text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

translations.translation: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.

verses.text: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

translations.translation: So [always] remind [with the Quran]—[even] if the reminder is beneficial [only to some].

verses.text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ

translations.translation: Those in awe [of Allah] will be mindful [of it].

verses.text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى

translations.translation: But it will be shunned by the most wretched,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

translations.translation: who will burn in the greatest Fire,

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

translations.translation: where they will not [be able to] live or die.

verses.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

translations.translation: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves,

verses.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray.

verses.text: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

translations.translation: But you [deniers only] prefer the life of this world,

verses.text: وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ

translations.translation: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting.

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.translation: This is certainly [mentioned] in the earlier Scriptures—

verses.text: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

translations.translation: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَـٰشِيَةِ

translations.translation: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you [O Prophet]?

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ

translations.translation: On that Day [some] faces will be downcast,

verses.text: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ

translations.translation: [totally] overburdened, exhausted,

verses.text: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً

translations.translation: burning in a scorching Fire,

verses.text: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍ

translations.translation: left to drink from a scalding spring.

verses.text: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ

translations.translation: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub,

verses.text: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ

translations.translation: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.

verses.text: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ

translations.translation: On that Day [other] faces will be glowing with bliss,

verses.text: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ

translations.translation: [fully] pleased with their striving,

verses.text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ

translations.translation: in an elevated Garden,

verses.text: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَـٰغِيَةً

translations.translation: where no idle talk will be heard.

verses.text: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ

translations.translation: In it will be a running spring,

verses.text: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ

translations.translation: along with thrones raised high,

verses.text: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ

translations.translation: and cups set at hand,

verses.text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ

translations.translation: and [fine] cushions lined up,

verses.text: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ

translations.translation: and [splendid] carpets spread out.

verses.text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ

translations.translation: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were [masterfully] created;

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ

translations.translation: and the sky—how it was raised [high];

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ

translations.translation: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up;

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ

translations.translation: and the earth—how it was levelled out?

verses.text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ

translations.translation: So, [continue to] remind [all, O  Prophet], for your duty is only to remind.

verses.text: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ

translations.translation: You are not [there] to compel them [to believe].

verses.text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

translations.translation: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief,

verses.text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ

translations.translation: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment.

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ

translations.translation: Surely to Us is their return,

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم

translations.translation: then surely with Us is their reckoning.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْفَجْرِ

translations.translation: By the dawn,

verses.text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ

translations.translation: and the ten nights,

verses.text: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ

translations.translation: and the even and the odd,

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ

translations.translation: and the night when it passes!

verses.text: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ

translations.translation: Is all this [not] a sufficient oath for those who have sense?

verses.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

translations.translation: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—

verses.text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ

translations.translation: [the people] of Iram—with [their] great stature,

verses.text: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

translations.translation: unmatched in any other land;

verses.text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ

translations.translation: and Thamûd who carved [their homes into] the rocks in the [Stone] Valley;

verses.text: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ

translations.translation: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures?

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

translations.translation: They all transgressed throughout the land,

verses.text: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ

translations.translation: spreading much corruption there.

verses.text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ

translations.translation: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment.

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ

translations.translation: [For] your Lord is truly vigilant.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ

translations.translation: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through [His] generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has [deservedly] honoured me!”

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ

translations.translation: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has [undeservedly] humiliated me!”

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ

translations.translation: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not [even] gracious to the orphan,

verses.text: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

translations.translation: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor.

verses.text: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا

translations.translation: And you devour [others’] inheritance greedily,

verses.text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا

translations.translation: and love wealth fervently.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا

translations.translation: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over,

verses.text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا

translations.translation: and your Lord comes [to judge] with angels, rank upon rank,

verses.text: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

translations.translation: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every [disbelieving] person will remember [their own sins]. But what is the use of remembering then?

verses.text: يَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى

translations.translation: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth [something good] for my [true] life.”

verses.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

translations.translation: On that Day He will punish [them] severely, like no other,

verses.text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

translations.translation: and bind [them] tightly, like no other.

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ

translations.translation: [Allah will say to the righteous,] “O tranquil soul!

verses.text: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً

translations.translation: Return to your Lord, well pleased [with Him] and well pleasing [to Him].

verses.text: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَـٰدِى

translations.translation: So join My servants,

verses.text: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى

translations.translation: and enter My Paradise.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

translations.translation: I do swear by this city [of Mecca]—

verses.text: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

translations.translation: even though you [O Prophet] are subject to abuse in this city—

verses.text: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ

translations.translation: and by every parent and [their] child!

verses.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, We have created humankind in [constant] struggle.

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ

translations.translation: Do they think that no one has power over them,

verses.text: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا

translations.translation: boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”?

verses.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

translations.translation: Do they think that no one sees them?

verses.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ

translations.translation: Have We not given them two eyes,

verses.text: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ

translations.translation: a tongue, and two lips;

verses.text: وَهَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ

translations.translation: and shown them the two ways [of right and wrong]?

verses.text: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ

translations.translation: If only they had attempted the challenging path [of goodness instead]!

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what [attempting] the challenging path is?

verses.text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

translations.translation: It is to free a slave,

verses.text: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ

translations.translation: or to give food in times of famine

verses.text: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ

translations.translation: to an orphaned relative

verses.text: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ

translations.translation: or to a poor person in distress,

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ

translations.translation: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.

verses.text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ

translations.translation: These are the people of the right.

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ

translations.translation: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.

verses.text: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ

translations.translation: The Fire will be sealed over them.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

translations.translation: By the sun and its brightness,

verses.text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا

translations.translation: and the moon as it follows it,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا

translations.translation: and the day as it unveils it,

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا

translations.translation: and the night as it conceals it!

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا

translations.translation: And by heaven and [the One] Who built it,

verses.text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا

translations.translation: and the earth and [the One] Who spread it!

verses.text: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا

translations.translation: And by the soul and [the One] Who fashioned it,

verses.text: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا

translations.translation: then with [the knowledge of] right and wrong inspired it!

verses.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا

translations.translation: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul,

verses.text: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا

translations.translation: and doomed is the one who corrupts it!

verses.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ

translations.translation: Thamûd rejected [the truth] out of arrogance,

verses.text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا

translations.translation: when the most wicked of them was roused [to kill the she-camel].

verses.text: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا

translations.translation: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “[Do not disturb] Allah’s camel and her [turn to] drink!”

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

translations.translation: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground.

verses.text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَـٰهَا

translations.translation: He has no fear of consequences.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ

translations.translation: By the night when it covers,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: and the day when it shines!

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ

translations.translation: And by [the One] Who created male and female!

verses.text: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ

translations.translation: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ

translations.translation: As for the one who is charitable, mindful [of Allah],

verses.text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

translations.translation: and [firmly] believes in the finest reward,

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

translations.translation: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ

translations.translation: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent [to Allah],

verses.text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

translations.translation: and [staunchly] denies the finest reward,

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ

translations.translation: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship.

verses.text: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble [into Hell].

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ

translations.translation: It is certainly upon Us [alone] to show [the way to] guidance.

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.translation: And surely to Us [alone] belong this life and the next.

verses.text: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ

translations.translation: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire,

verses.text: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى

translations.translation: in which none will burn except the most wretched—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

translations.translation: who deny and turn away.

verses.text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى

translations.translation: But the righteous will be spared from it—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

translations.translation: who donate [some of] their wealth only to purify themselves,

verses.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ

translations.translation: not in return for someone’s favours,

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

translations.translation: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High.

verses.text: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ

translations.translation: They will certainly be pleased.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

translations.translation: By the morning sunlight,

verses.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

translations.translation: and the night when it falls still!

verses.text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

translations.translation: Your Lord [O Prophet] has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful [of you].

verses.text: وَلَلْـَٔاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

translations.translation: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one.

verses.text: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ

translations.translation: And [surely] your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased.

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

translations.translation: Did He not find you as an orphan then sheltered you?

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّا فَهَدَىٰ

translations.translation: Did He not find you unguided then guided you?

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ

translations.translation: And did He not find you needy then satisfied your needs?

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ

translations.translation: So do not oppress the orphan,

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ

translations.translation: nor repulse the beggar.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ

translations.translation: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ

translations.translation: Have We not uplifted your heart for you [O Prophet],

verses.text: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ

translations.translation: relieved you of the burden

verses.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ

translations.translation: which weighed so heavily on your back,

verses.text: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ

translations.translation: and elevated your renown for you?

verses.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

translations.translation: So, surely with hardship comes ease.

verses.text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

translations.translation: Surely with [that] hardship comes [more] ease.

verses.text: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ

translations.translation: So once you have fulfilled [your duty], strive [in devotion],

verses.text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب

translations.translation: turning to your Lord [alone] with hope.

verses.text: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ

translations.translation: By the fig and the olive [of Jerusalem],

verses.text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

translations.translation: and Mount Sinai,

verses.text: وَهَـٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ

translations.translation: and this secure city [of Mecca]!

verses.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ

translations.translation: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.

verses.text: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَـٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَـٰفِلِينَ

translations.translation: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low [in Hell],

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

translations.translation: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.

verses.text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: Now, what makes you deny the [final] Judgment?

verses.text: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ

translations.translation: Is Allah not the most just of all judges?

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ

translations.translation: Read, [O Prophet,] in the Name of your Lord Who created—

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ

translations.translation: created humans from a clinging clot.

verses.text: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ

translations.translation: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ

translations.translation: Who taught by the pen—

verses.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ

translations.translation: taught humanity what they knew not.

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ

translations.translation: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds

verses.text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ

translations.translation: once they think they are self-sufficient.

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ

translations.translation: [But] surely to your Lord is the return [of all].

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ

translations.translation: Have you seen the man who prevents

verses.text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: a servant [of Ours] from praying?

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

translations.translation: What if this [servant] is [rightly] guided,

verses.text: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ

translations.translation: or encourages righteousness?

verses.text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

translations.translation: What if that [man] persists in denial and turns away?

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ

translations.translation: Does he not know that Allah sees [all]?

verses.text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

translations.translation: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—

verses.text: نَاصِيَةٍ كَـٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ

translations.translation: a lying, sinful forelock.

verses.text: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ

translations.translation: So let him call his associates.

verses.text: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ

translations.translation: We will call the wardens of Hell.

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩

translations.translation: Again, no! Never obey him [O Prophet]! Rather, [continue to] prostrate and draw near [to Allah].

verses.text: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ

translations.translation: Indeed, [it is] We [Who] sent this [Quran] down on the Night of Glory.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?

verses.text: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ

translations.translation: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.

verses.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ

translations.translation: That night the angels and the [holy] spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every [decreed] matter.

verses.text: سَلَـٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ

translations.translation: It is all peace until the break of dawn.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ

translations.translation: The disbelievers from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist [from disbelief] until the clear proof came to them:

verses.text: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً

translations.translation: a messenger from Allah, reciting scrolls of [utmost] purity,

verses.text: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ

translations.translation: containing upright commandments.

verses.text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ

translations.translation: It was not until this clear proof came to the People of the Book that they became divided [about his prophethood]—

verses.text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ

translations.translation: even though they were only commanded to worship Allah [alone] with sincere devotion to Him in all uprightness, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. That is the upright Way.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

translations.translation: Indeed, those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there forever. They are the worst of [all] beings.

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

translations.translation: Indeed, those who believe and do good—they are the best of [all] beings.

verses.text: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ

translations.translation: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is [only] for those in awe of their Lord.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا

translations.translation: When the earth is shaken [in] its ultimate quaking,

verses.text: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا

translations.translation: and when the earth throws out [all] its contents,

verses.text: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا لَهَا

translations.translation: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا

translations.translation: on that Day the earth will recount everything,

verses.text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا

translations.translation: having been inspired by your Lord [to do so].

verses.text: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ

translations.translation: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown [the consequences of] their deeds.

verses.text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.

verses.text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ

translations.translation: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْعَـٰدِيَـٰتِ ضَبْحًا

translations.translation: ’ By the galloping, panting horses,

verses.text: فَٱلْمُورِيَـٰتِ قَدْحًا

translations.translation: striking sparks of fire [with their hoofs],

verses.text: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًا

translations.translation: launching raids at dawn,

verses.text: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًا

translations.translation: stirring up [clouds of] dust,

verses.text: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا

translations.translation: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines!

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌ

translations.translation: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ

translations.translation: and they certainly attest to this—

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

translations.translation: and they are truly extreme in their love of [worldly] gains.

verses.text: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ

translations.translation: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out,

verses.text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ

translations.translation: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ

translations.translation: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

translations.translation: The Striking Disaster!

verses.text: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

translations.translation: What is the Striking Disaster?

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is?

verses.text: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ

translations.translation: [It is] the Day people will be like scattered moths,

verses.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ

translations.translation: and the mountains will be like carded wool.

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

translations.translation: So as for those whose scale is heavy [with good deeds],

verses.text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ

translations.translation: they will be in a life of bliss.

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

translations.translation: And as for those whose scale is light,

verses.text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌ

translations.translation: their home will be the abyss.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what that is?

verses.text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ

translations.translation: [It is] a scorching Fire.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

translations.translation: Competition for more [gains] diverts you [from Allah],

verses.text: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ

translations.translation: until you end up in [your] graves.

verses.text: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: But no! You will soon come to know.

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

translations.translation: Again, no! You will soon come to know.

verses.text: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ

translations.translation: Indeed, if you were to know [your fate] with certainty, [you would have acted differently].

verses.text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ

translations.translation: [But] you will surely see the Hellfire.

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ

translations.translation: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

translations.translation: Then, on that Day, you will definitely be questioned about [your worldly] pleasures.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْعَصْرِ

translations.translation: By the [passage of] time!

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ

translations.translation: Surely humanity is in [grave] loss,

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ

translations.translation: except those who have faith, do good, and urge each other to the truth, and urge each other to perseverance.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ

translations.translation: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

translations.translation: who amasses wealth [greedily] and counts it [repeatedly],

verses.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

translations.translation: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal!

verses.text: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ

translations.translation: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher.

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ

translations.translation: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?

verses.text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ

translations.translation: [It is] Allah’s kindled Fire,

verses.text: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ

translations.translation: which rages over the hearts.

verses.text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ

translations.translation: It will be sealed over them,

verses.text: فِى عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ

translations.translation: [tightly secured] with long braces.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ

translations.translation: Have you not seen [O Prophet] how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

verses.text: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍ

translations.translation: Did He not frustrate their scheme?

verses.text: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ

translations.translation: For He sent against them flocks of birds,

verses.text: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ

translations.translation: that pelted them with stones of baked clay,

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍۭ

translations.translation: leaving them like chewed up straw.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَـٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ

translations.translation: [At least] for [the favour of] making Quraysh habitually secure—

verses.text: إِۦلَـٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ

translations.translation: secure in their trading caravan [to Yemen] in the winter and [Syria] in the summer—

verses.text: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ

translations.translation: let them worship the Lord of this [Sacred] House,

verses.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ

translations.translation: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ

translations.translation: Have you seen the one who denies the [final] Judgment?

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ

translations.translation: That is the one who repulses the orphan,

verses.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

translations.translation: and does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

verses.text: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

translations.translation: So woe to those [hypocrites] who pray

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ

translations.translation: yet are unmindful of their prayers;

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ

translations.translation: those who [only] show off,

verses.text: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ

translations.translation: and refuse to give [even the simplest] aid.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ

translations.translation: Indeed, We have granted you [O Prophet] abundant goodness.

verses.text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ

translations.translation: So pray and sacrifice to your Lord [alone].

verses.text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ

translations.translation: Only the one who hates you is truly cut off [from any goodness].

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “O you disbelievers!

verses.text: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.translation: I do not worship what you worship,

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ

translations.translation: nor do you worship what I worship.

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ

translations.translation: I will never worship what you worship,

verses.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَـٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ

translations.translation: nor will you ever worship what I worship.

verses.text: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ

translations.translation: You have your way, and I have my Way.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ

translations.translation: When Allah’s [ultimate] help comes and the victory [over Mecca is achieved],

verses.text: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا

translations.translation: and you [O Prophet] see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds,

verses.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا

translations.translation: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ

translations.translation: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he [himself] perish!

verses.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

translations.translation: Neither his wealth nor [worldly] gains will benefit him.

verses.text: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ

translations.translation: He will burn in a flaming Fire,

verses.text: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ

translations.translation: and [so will] his wife, the carrier of [thorny] kindling,

verses.text: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ

translations.translation: around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre.

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “He is Allah—One [and Indivisible];

verses.text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

translations.translation: Allah—the Sustainer [needed by all].

verses.text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ

translations.translation: He has never had offspring, nor was He born.

verses.text: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ

translations.translation: And there is none comparable to Him.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak

verses.text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

translations.translation: from the evil of whatever He has created,

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

translations.translation: and from the evil of the night when it grows dark,

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَـٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ

translations.translation: and from the evil of those [witches casting spells by] blowing onto knots,

verses.text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

translations.translation: and from the evil of an envier when they envy.”

verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

translations.translation: Say, [O Prophet,] “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind,

verses.text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

translations.translation: the Master of humankind,

verses.text: إِلَـٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

translations.translation: the God of humankind,

verses.text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ

translations.translation: from the evil of the lurking whisperer—

verses.text: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

translations.translation: who whispers into the hearts of humankind—

verses.text: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ

translations.translation: from among jinn and humankind.”
